author: {'steamid': '76561198055915711', 'num_games_owned': 1034, 'num_reviews': 29, 'playtime_forever': 315, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 315, 'last_played': 1456164451}
review:
[h1]Чудо человеческой мысли безгранично.[/h1]

[i]Ровно также  бесконечна и сила людской глупости.

Иначе не скажешь, ведь эта игра почти феномен, который сочетает в себе два фактора:

[list]
    [*] Здесь я отдаю должное тому, кто всё это придумал. Совместить простой и ни к чему не обязывающий кликер с довольно оригинальной идеей: Возможность открыть баночку майонеза! До такого нужно додуматься. К сожалению, сама идея - это единственное, что меня хоть как - то завлекло.

    [*] Действительность же всё убивает. Возможность скоротать время между делами, хоть с каким-то интересом не увенчалась успехом. Процесс неимоверно скучен. Нас пытаются по итогу развлечь хоть как - то меняя банки, сопровождая это безудержным кликанием по мышке. Всё упирается в желание получить последнее достижение и забыть про то, как я попался на эту удочку.
[/list]

А удочка самая простая, как и наживка на Пользователя. Рецепт на протяжении многих лет не меняется. Достижения и карточки, которые как-никак, но окупают сам продукт, что для многих немаловажно. Создается ощущение, будто бы Потребитель ничего не потерял, а наоборот, приобрёл! А достижения за так? А забавные баночки? А какая времяубивалка, да за такую цену!

Именно это я и вижу в большинстве отзывов. До сих пор удивляет то, как это нахваливают. Более того, люди согласны с тем, что их оставили в дураках, но зато с улыбкой на лице! Тысячи бессмысленных  и бесцельных кликов,чтобы открыть чёртову банку, совершенно не стоили своего потраченного времени.

Этот продукт представляется мне хорошим психологическим экспериментом, по итогу которого вполне себе можно написать статью - другую в журнале.

Возможно кто-нибудь так и поступил.
[/i]

author: {'steamid': '76561198059673134', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 23, 'playtime_forever': 28, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 28, 'last_played': 1530018346}
review:
I unlocked 94% of the achievements in 25 minutes.

The gameplay is nothing but a mayonnaise jar, occasionally dressed like other things.

I clicked 8000 times.

You can right-click for the most basic of arcade-style shooters (think: Asteroid) for no reward or purpose.

I saw a lets-play of this game beforehand, and am still disappointed.

I do not 'diss' the creators of this game, because of ALL the "clicker" games there are, this is one of the most polished ones. Achievements, good art, and fleshed-out (if not repetetive) music. It counts your clicks. There's not much else to this game.

The reason I give this a negative review is because, let's be honest, this should've been a free (maybe-even-flash) game. 

I have no issue paying developers for their work. An animation of a jiggling jar accompanied by a "clink" sound, some music on loop, a cursor that "taps" the jar when you click, and ~20 minutes of gamplay, is NOT worth a Dollar. Even cookie clicker had more than that.

Would rather go get something off the Dollar menu at McDonalds. At least I'd it'd last a few hours before I shat it out, unlike this game.

EDIT: Also, don't act like I'm not "getting the joke" with this game. I got the joke. It's a good parody. For the first 10-ish minutes. Then my finger got tired and I found that I was wasting an additional 10 minutes of my life for nothing. 

Love ya, devs, for giving it an honest-good try to put your game into the "Clicker" fad of gaming.. but the fad is over and your game costs a dollar. I WILL be seeking a refund.

author: {'steamid': '76561198150128589', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 7, 'playtime_forever': 63, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 62, 'last_played': 1644419413}
review:
Génial quand on a la collectionnite et qu'on aime cliquer en rafale juste pour cliquer, comme ça !
C'est un clicker game qui a du goût ^^

Les succès débloqués permettent de suivre le fil de 3 petites histoires différentes, le tout parsemé de "fun facts", c'est très plaisant et amusant.

Bien sûr, on peut se demander si cela vaut la peine de payer même quelques centimes pour un jeu aussi simpliste et vite fini... 

Personnellement j'estime que oui : le prix n'est pas excessif et loin d'être au-dessus de ses ambitions somme toute très humbles, et malgré tout, c'est un concept, il y a un peu + que juste du clic à la pelle sans aucune motivation et il y a de l'idée et du boulot derrière, et je ne parle même pas des graphismes délicieusement vintage !

Aucun regret pour moi :D

author: {'steamid': '76561198195059870', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 12, 'playtime_forever': 62, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 61, 'last_played': 1558986833}
review:
<<My Name is Mayo>>

Ich liebe Mini-Spiele & verrückte Dinge. "My Name is Mayo" kombiniert beides.

Spielablauf:
Im Endeffekt muss man nur mit der Maus klicken & wenn man eine neue Errungenschaft frei geschaltet hat dort drauf klicken & so bekommt die Mayo ein neues Outfit. Bei 10 000Klicks & allen Errungenschaften ist das Spiel vorbei.
Nach ca. 1h ist das Mini-Spiel geschafft.

Die Grafik:
Sie ist süß gemacht, gefällt mir für den Preis super !! Erst recht diese ulkigen Outfits :D
Kleiner Spoiler: *deine Mayo bekommt ein Leoparden-Bikini* ♥


Mein Fazit:
Süß gemacht, witzige Idee, aber nach ca 6.000 Klicks tat mir die Hand weh & es hat sich hingezogen. Die Mayo-Outfits machen es aber wieder gut.
Für jemanden, der Errungenschaften & "Perfekte Spiele" für sein Profil sammelt eine Super Möglichkeit, aber auch klasse für den langeweilevertreib.

4 von 5 Herzen♥

XOXO Madame Citron

author: {'steamid': '76561198092169097', 'num_games_owned': 908, 'num_reviews': 12, 'playtime_forever': 74, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 74, 'last_played': 1519604785}
review:
[h1] Das Ultimative Spiel für Mayo Liebhaber! [/h1]

Als großer Mayo Fan und Kämpfer an der vordersten Front gegen diese Ketchup Menschen, war dieses Spiel natürlich ein [b][u]absoluter Pflichtkauf[/u][/b] für mich! Und ich muss sagen, ich wurde zu keinster Zeit auch nur im geringsten Enttäuscht. 

Die Art und Weise, wie die Mayonnaise hier dargestellt wird im Zusammenspiel mit der Musik und dem klicken der Maus, haben mich besonders angesprochen. Die Story hinter dem Spiel ist auch sehr gut geschrieben, wobei man natürlich sagen muss, dass eine Story über Mayonnaise auch einfach nicht schlecht werden kann! 

Nach ungefähr einer Stunde hatte ich das Spiel dann mit allen Errungenschaften durchgespielt und auch wenn ich noch Stunden weiterspielen hätte können, fühle ich mich dem Endsieg über die Ketchupisten schon deutlich näher und [b]DAFÜR[/b] möchte ich mich bei den Entwicklern einfach nochmal mit einem großen [b]Dankeschön[/b] bedanken!


[h1]Für immer Mayo und natürlich NIEDER mit den Ketchup Frevlern meine Freunde![/h1]

author: {'steamid': '76561198059033420', 'num_games_owned': 1064, 'num_reviews': 27, 'playtime_forever': 164, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 164, 'last_played': 1518909905}
review:
Esse é um jogo no estilo clicker que você precisa simplesmente clicar no vidro de maionese. A diferença para esse jogo é que possui uma história que amarra as "missões" e os achievements. 

Quando começar o jogo você deve, após os primeiros cliques e achievements, clicar no menu superior à esquerda e selecionar uma "missão". Dentro de cada missão você irá atingir outros achievements com quantidade de cliques entre 10 e 500, sendo em média 100 cliques.

Com um autoclicker e aproximadamente 45 minutos é possível conseguir todos os achievements.

Gostei :)

author: {'steamid': '76561198327367911', 'num_games_owned': 710, 'num_reviews': 97, 'playtime_forever': 64, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 64, 'last_played': 1514929204}
review:
Wonderfully whipped! Probably the most caucasian game ever, lol. It's a simple mouse clicker, with some hillarious insites and stories on sex, growing up and just about everything in life really.

Pros - simple and easy game play, great for casual gamers, cheap, hillarious and interesting random facts
Cons - short

A little, guilty pleasure game this, since you don't really want to be telling your AAA shooter clan buddies you were getting a kick from playing with mayo... Lol, still wort it thuough. Have a potato. 8/10

author: {'steamid': '76561198193589490', 'num_games_owned': 676, 'num_reviews': 141, 'playtime_forever': 123, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 123, 'last_played': 1511486700}
review:
Ohje wieder eines dieser [i]Clicker-Spiele[/i]
Aber dieses ist anders. Ich habe schon hochpreisige RPGs gespielt, wo der Protagonist nicht mal annähernd so viel Charme hat wie dieses Glas Mayonnaise! 

Man klickt sich durch 4 verschiedene Storylines, bzw. begleitet die Mayonnaise durch ein paar Lebensabschnitte

Abgesehen von verschiedenen Hintergründen und Kostümen für die Mayonese, wird man zwischendruch sogar noch mit Random Facts belohnt. (Richtigkeit ohne Gewähr)
Besonders die Retroaufmachung und der trockene Humor haben mich angesprochen und ziehen sich komplett durch das Spiel, Abzeichen, Hintergründe & Emoticons.

Kaufempfehlung wenn es runtergesetzt ist <3 Habe es für 74Cent erworben.

[spoiler]"I will tell you something important about life. Life is like a box of chocolates. Just kidding, who compares life with a box of chocolates?"[/spoiler]

author: {'steamid': '76561198114554013', 'num_games_owned': 248, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 121, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 118, 'last_played': 1604050910}
review:
[h1] tl;dr [/h1]
[u][b]obra maestra.[/b][/u]

Era una noche oscura, los cigarrillos y el café no eran suficiente.
Quería jugar; quería alejarme de la sucia realidad que conlleva estar vivo.

De pronto, algo saltó en mi pantalla.
Había recibido un regalo, y me dije a mi mismo:
-¿es...? NO. No puede ser posible.

Pero lo era.
El juego había cruzado el escenario greenlight.
Me sentí sucio por no haberme enterado antes.

Habrá tomado cuatro, tal vez seis segundos para instalarse.
Jamás había estado tan ansioso.

Lo que sentí al tenerlo en mi biblioteca, y verlo instalado...
el poder hacer click en "Jugar"...  simplemente magnifíco.
Es una sensación indescriptible.

No quiero hacer spoilers sobre esta obra maestra, pero creo que merece totalmente la pena adquirirlo, con o sin rebajas de steam.

Mi vida jamás volverá a ser igual.
La mayonesa me ha demostrado el verdadero significado de la vida.
Ahora entiendo qué es el amor.

Entender todo esto es complicado, pero deberás experimentarlo; y así... comprender.

Nuestro lenguaje no ha evolucionado lo suficiente para poder transmitir lo que este juego te hace sentir.
He grabado mi travesía a través de su campaña tan inmersiva.

Esto quedará como mi legado para futuras generaciones; especialmente para mi descendencia.

He ascendido.

PERO ESTO NO ACABA AQUÍ.

Para alcanzar mi verdadera forma, debo dedicarme a conseguir mi insignia nivel 5 y como bonus; la reflectante.
(Espero estén disponibles).

author: {'steamid': '76561198014833158', 'num_games_owned': 965, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 40, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 40, 'last_played': 1492423267}
review:
[h1] Normal Review![/h1]

I bought this game because a buddy of mine said it was an easy achievement game, and it is. But we'll leave that for the Achievement Review after this. 

You're not getting much here, honestly. It's a clicker. [i]BUT[/i] It's a quarky clicker. You click the jar of mayo and it preogresses little short stories depending on which one you have selected at the time, each stsory also has a related costume for the jar of mayo. 

[h1] Achievement Review![/h1]
Just click! That's all this game has to offer in terms of gameplay. You can honestly just download a clicker and do it that was pretty quickly, which I reccomend because you don't want to break your mouse, now, do you?

author: {'steamid': '76561198044575410', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 26, 'playtime_forever': 58, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 56, 'last_played': 1653195851}
review:
マヨネーズの小瓶が目の前にあるのでそれを指でつんつんするゲームです。
つんつんしているとマヨネーズの小瓶を装飾する衣装が手に入ります。
色々な衣装で装飾されたマヨネーズの小瓶をさらにつんつんすると新しいい装飾が手に入るのでどんどんつんつんして下さい。
全部の実績を解除するには10000回つんつんする必要がありますが、装飾はその半分くらいまでで全部解放されます。
あと5000回くらいは無心でつんつんする忍耐が必要です。
右クリックするとつんつんする指の絵が変わるので気分転換にどうでしょうか。といっても3種類しかありませんが。
このゲームのオチ？あなたの頭に浮かんだそのままだと思いますよ、たぶん。

author: {'steamid': '76561198117837119', 'num_games_owned': 3902, 'num_reviews': 178, 'playtime_forever': 53, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 53, 'last_played': 1472609874}
review:
If you don't mind idle clickers, definitely consider picking this one up. Otherwise, I advise you not to get this.

I really like this game! It's funny and has multiple "story lines" for your mayonaise jar. Many of the achievements have different costumes for your mayonaise jar to wear, which are funny to see.

After you complete all of the achievements and get all of the costumes, that's about it.

I'm sorry My Name is Mayo, it's been fun while it lasted.

author: {'steamid': '76561198064139415', 'num_games_owned': 777, 'num_reviews': 411, 'playtime_forever': 96, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 48, 'last_played': 1623142819}
review:
Empfehlenswert: Nein (persönliche Wertung: 1/10)

Errungenschaften: Ja (Stumpfheit siegt)

Positiv:
- simples Spielprinzip

Negativ:
- stumpfes Gameplay, welches Ausdauer benötigt

Fazit:
My Name is Mayo ist ein Spiel, welches für Achievementjäger gemacht ist. Gefunden habe ich es in einem Beitrag auf Facebook, in dem das Spiel als leichte Platintrophäe geworben wurde. Es ist nicht allzu schwer die Steuerung zu verinnerlichen. Für diejenigen die da Schwierigkeiten haben: Klicke auf das Glas! Mehr aber auch nicht! Sobald die ersten Erfolge freigeschaltet wurden, kann man das Mayonaiseglas nach belieben anziehen und sogenannte "Storylines" verfolgen, was einen noch mehr Erfolge einbringt! Eins muss ich dazu noch sagen... Man braucht Ausdauer! Hätte ich nicht einen Laptop mit Touchpad, wäre ich durch das Klicken der Maus Wahnsinng geworden. Die 10000 Klicks erreichen sich nämlich nicht von alleine! Nach 48 Minuten war ich durch und hatte die 100% erfüllt. Schaltet euch den Fernseher an, wenn ihr diese stupide Erfahrung machen wollt, sonst verkalkt ihr noch. Empfehlenswert für Achievementjäger ohne Sehnenscheidenentzündung, jedoch darüber hinaus nicht zu empfehlen!!!!

author: {'steamid': '76561198130516505', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 324, 'playtime_forever': 84, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 84, 'last_played': 1501556172}
review:
My Name is Mayo is a narrative clicker in which you click a jar to progress and unlock interesting dialogue and story paths.

Pros:
-Interesting and sometimes hilarious dialogue and visual jokes, considering that you are literally just clicking on a jar of mayo
-It has trading cards and Steam Achievements
-The game knows how to pace itself, and in my opinion is a clicker done right. Running an autoclicker you can complete the game with all achievements within about an hour, but you'd rather want to click away and read the amazing dialogue that appears after every set amount of clicks
-Simplistic design and user interface is appealing, and provides easy to navigate and better overall experience

Cons:
-You going to have to click a whole lot. Possible finger cramps may arise

Overall, this is an awesome, short clicker. Perfect as an interesting time waster
7/10

author: {'steamid': '76561198385501958', 'num_games_owned': 26, 'num_reviews': 74, 'playtime_forever': 34, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 34, 'last_played': 1503581839}
review:
From Green Lava Studios comes My Name is Mayo, a clicker game with a difference. Only costing £0.79 on Steam, I decided to give this a try, knowing that there was a story behind the whole thing. 

There isn’t much behind this game other than the constant clicking of a mayonnaise jar, and it didn’t seem that promising. However, Green Lava Studios have gone beyond with numerous stories, unlocked by continuing to click on the mayonnaise jar. The stories themselves are absolutely hilarious, and the skins you unlock on the mayonnaise jar by progressing through the story and hysterical; I fell off my chair laughing at one point. 

Highly repetitive, but with under an hour competition time, and enough entertainment to keep you chuckling, this is a good spend of 79 pence. I really don’t regret buying this game, and I’ll definitely be playing it more than once.

author: {'steamid': '76561198159392957', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 31, 'playtime_forever': 48, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 48, 'last_played': 1503069131}
review:
[quote=Mayo] My name is Mayo	[/quote]
Gra jest podobna do tych wszystkich clickerów na telefony. Całą grę tylko klikamy szarym palcem (który zastępuję kursor) na słojik z majonezem (można użyć też spacji) i w ten sposób zdobywamy corazto dziwniejsze stroje/osiągnięcia/fragmenty historii. Gra w swoim zamyśle śmieszna/prosta/głupia i na dłuższą metę nie ma żadnego sensu, ale gdy dodamy samą głupotę produkcji do ciekawych osiągnięć a tagże samego prześmiewczego uznania niektórych tematów wychodzi nawet ciekawa gra. Ale i tak nie jest ona bez wad. Jedną z takich właśnie wad jest brak wspierania jakichś sensownych roździelczości lub brak menu opcji dzięki którym mogli byśmy np: ściszyć muzykę lub zmienić ustawienia graficzne. I to może akurat nie wada ale spostrzeżenie: ta gra była by lepsza na telefony niż na komputery. Podsumowując: Masz za dużo czasu? Nie masz pracy/dziewczyny/przyjaciół? lubisz majonez? Jeśli tak to moje imię to Majonez!

author: {'steamid': '76561198304018601', 'num_games_owned': 1279, 'num_reviews': 56, 'playtime_forever': 74, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 74, 'last_played': 1501606090}
review:
ズバリ正直な評価をすると『ゲームなのかこれは？』という感じです。
画面中央に鎮座するマヨネーズのビンをひたすら人差し指で叩き続ける。それだけ。
価格のことも考えると一発ネタであることは問題ないと思うのですが、ネタをうまく料理できていないのがいただけない。
例えば叩いているとビンの様子が変わるとか、ビンの柄なんかでコレクション要素があるとかそういう広げ方ができたはずなのですが・・・
何の変化も無さ過ぎて本来一番の客層であるはずのバカゲー、ネタゲーマーにもお勧めできません。

author: {'steamid': '76561198138230812', 'num_games_owned': 1959, 'num_reviews': 201, 'playtime_forever': 50, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 50, 'last_played': 1501743407}
review: Suitable for achievement hunters. Your goal is to reach 10 thousand hits with your mouse and do 46 different tasks while progressing. It's kinda humoristic. I liked this game and I can really recommend it to others. It comes with 50 Achievements that takes less then 1 hour to get and Steam Trading Cards.

author: {'steamid': '76561198082808136', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 37, 'playtime_forever': 338, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 338, 'last_played': 1466748774}
review:
I'm not sure why I bought this. It's got meme factor, but it's kind of regrettable. You just end up realizing the jokes are kind of stale, but to make it worth your money you find an autoclicker program online to quickly get all the achievements. You close the game out, uninstall it, and never play it again.

My Name is Mayo is really tasteless, no pun intended. (Or is it?)

author: {'steamid': '76561198046636147', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 160, 'playtime_forever': 61, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 61, 'last_played': 1498994758}
review:
A short little game that shows a lot of humor and lets you work out your finger muscles more than your average clicker game. If all that clicking is starting to kill your mouse, you can use the space button to double your output :) 

That being said, I bought it during the Summer sale when it cost less than a Euro. This price seems reasonable to me, even though there are many free games on the web that give you more fun for free. 

So what I'm trying to say is, if this game is ALMOST free than you should buy it. Just remember, this is more of a distraction than an experience.

author: {'steamid': '76561198225073792', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 17, 'playtime_forever': 64, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 64, 'last_played': 1498190621}
review:
The good:
Cute aesthetic 
A couple cute-ish story lines 

The bad:
Extremely repetetive soundtrack with obnoxious mayo sound
No volume controls (or any other controls)
While the story lines are cute, they are WAY too short
The game itself is too short--spent an hour on it with breaks and completed all 50 achievements

The... meh...?
If you are looking for a clicker, strictly a clicker, this game may be for you.  There are NO upgrades, NO buffs, NOTHING to make clicking go faster.  Also, while you're clicking, you're never told what you're clicking for.  There's nothing listed next to the ever-increasing number on the top of the screen.  I assume that the clicks are literally taps on the side of the mayo jar... I guess it's supposed to be cute?  
The story, while artistically attractive, is far too short and doesn't make much sense.
There are only four screens in the whole game, two of which are different leader boards.

This seems to be a clicker made by some developers that heard clickers were really big right now and never actually played a clicker.  Especially as the game forces you to move your pointer as your clicking if you want to have your clicks count.  Even at only an hour in, I feel like I'm getting carpal tunnel.

There are literally hundreds of free clicker games that are better crafted, smarter, and less agrivating than My Name is Mayo out there.

tl;dr - This is a repetetive, short click-fest.  Just go out and play Cookie Clicker if you're looking for a fun clicker game.

author: {'steamid': '76561198079167614', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 8, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 8, 'last_played': 1498071586}
review:
Wow, i've barely even played this game, and already its amazing!
The game starts with just a normal mayo jar, but you soon realise something is amiss.
The storyline of this game is just amazing, you will have an experiance like no other.
Sure the game has some tedious parts, but when you get through it, my god its amazing.
You have to play this game to truly experiance what this game has to offer, and its so cheap
its a literal bargain for the hours of fun that are sure to come out of this game.
Love is true, Love is life, Love....is....mayo...

author: {'steamid': '76561198027267313', 'num_games_owned': 1838, 'num_reviews': 4460, 'playtime_forever': 1651, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1651, 'last_played': 1497742647}
review:
Tags: Clicker - Fast
Additional Tags: Delete Local Content & Remove from Library

TLDR: Rather competently put together but no gameplay to speak of. Would damage your mouse to 100%. Quota spamclick game.

Presentation with fifties-style audiovisuals, a few different trees of unlockables that you can pursue by clicking further and activating the newest unlocked button to continue that specific sub-category of achievements further. Most of them are simple one line of dialogue and one icon. Activating them for further development will sometimes cosmetically alter the pot of mayo with a mustache, a rain of cats, or other such nonsense. That is basically the crux of the game. Because of the repetitive mindless nature of the game, the lack of real gameplay, and the meaningless nature of the unlocks I am going to simply remove this for declutter altogther. However this game does make me curious about their newer title Mr Massagy as perhaps their humor and ability to craft nice looking user interfaces and menus and think of multiple branching paths would translate well in a humoristic dating sim type game...

author: {'steamid': '76561198059223032', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 14, 'playtime_forever': 64, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 64, 'last_played': 1496678326}
review:
My Name is Mayo is a 2D clicker game.
The gameplay consists in clicking on a jar of Mayonnese to open it. You have some kind of storyline, which is unlocked by clicking on different achievment that give you tasks (for example clicking 300 times on the jar). These tasks unlock new achievments and thereby also new tasks. The names of the different achievments tell you the story and the jar of Mayonnese changes its appearance when a new task is applied.
For the achievments hunters out there, like me, the game has 50 achievments that are easily unlockable in under one hour by clicking on the jar 10000 times.
In the end, My Name is Mayo is a fun game in comparison to other clicking games. It is not very expensive, but you should try to get it for free if you can. I recommend this for people who like weird clicking games and especially for achievment hunters.

author: {'steamid': '76561198085852251', 'num_games_owned': 235, 'num_reviews': 58, 'playtime_forever': 123, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 98, 'last_played': 1485086562}
review:
[quote=机核-Nadya]按理说，人们应该强烈谴责这种游戏的频繁出现，因为这种游戏就像毒品一样，没有好处却会让你上瘾以至于你不得不花费大量的时间和金钱来满足自己空虚感。你会不停地玩，不停地点击，或许你还会骗你的朋友们与你一起堕入这地狱之中。到最后，你发现除了更加空虚之外，你什么都没了。人们应当团结起来共同抵制这种百害而无一利的游戏，将已经陷入疯狂的之中的受害者们拉回光明之中。
    [b]但是，事实却是，人们都疯了。[/b]
    如你所见，游戏的用户评测竟然是“特别好评”。这也就证明了接触到这款游戏的人，无一幸免，全部落入了这可怕的圈套之中。[/quote]

[spoiler] 点击数8k的时候鼠标已经开始出问题了，后来才想到，只要从Google上搜autoclicker便能解决一切，我感觉自己就是个傻逼。[/spoiler]

author: {'steamid': '76561198006855562', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 8, 'playtime_forever': 87, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 23, 'last_played': 1507800693}
review:
Well, what's there to say about this game? First of all, with 99 cent it has a pretty low price tag. You can easily get 50 achievements and a perfect game out of this by clicking a glass of mayonnaise 10000 times with a few short breaks to change its costume (yep, seriously). Sadly, that's all this game offers. The humor is somewhat okay, graphics are more like a flash game and after about half an hour to an hour you're through with this. It's not completely terrible (I played worse games), but it's also not a good or particularly entertaining game.

2 / 10

author: {'steamid': '76561198207484137', 'num_games_owned': 8328, 'num_reviews': 92, 'playtime_forever': 131, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 131, 'last_played': 1485500910}
review:
Well it is a clicker game, no point in denying that, and you have to be fan of clicker games to go all the way.
Which I did, so a quick sum of the + and - here:

+ It contains mayo and humor! (Perfect combo.)
+ It contains a hidden non mayo thing. (But can't tell due spoilers sweetie, spoilers!-
+ Same Dev's as the awesome Mr. Massagy. (Admit their awesomeness!) 
+ Can't feel my finger anymore, what a work out. (+10 skill points on fingering, yes that pun had to be made)
+ Great and not too hard achievements! (I secretly want moaaaaaar)
+ The satisfaction. (Not sure how to explain, probably because I'm a clicker addict..) 

- I think my mouse is bleeding and will be death soonish... Rip. (Overclocking..., no no, overclicking!)
- Oddly enough even with it played out, I have to urge to go back in and click more... (Mooooooar)

Overall for me personally, well worth it!
I like these Dev's and their games. ♡

author: {'steamid': '76561198102807112', 'num_games_owned': 592, 'num_reviews': 73, 'playtime_forever': 39, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 36, 'last_played': 1584693102}

author: {'steamid': '76561198024509107', 'num_games_owned': 1142, 'num_reviews': 32, 'playtime_forever': 115, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 115, 'last_played': 1485293496}
review: My Grandfather smoked his whole life. I was about 10 years old when my mother said to him, 'If you ever want to see your grandchildren graduate, you have to stop immediately.'. Tears welled up in his eyes when he realized what exactly was at stake. He gave it up immediately. Three years later he died of lung cancer. It was really sad and destroyed me. My mother said to me- 'Don't ever smoke. Please don't put your family through what your Grandfather put us through." I agreed. At 28, I have never touched a cigarette. I must say, I feel a very slight sense of regret for never having done it, because this game gave me cancer anyway.

author: {'steamid': '76561198088996732', 'num_games_owned': 200, 'num_reviews': 27, 'playtime_forever': 683, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 683, 'last_played': 1485448653}

author: {'steamid': '76561198246004398', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 40, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 37, 'last_played': 1491736399}
review: The simple premise of this game can be an instant turn off for many players since the clicking genere is dead and done and theres so many other "click an object and watch your numbers grow" games to the point where its annoying to see another one of these games. But this game has introduced to me an achievement that I have never before experienced in my life, and that achievement is to 100% a game. This may seem like a joke, but in all my years of playing games I never once truly completed a video game. While that may be mostly because I prefer competitive online games, I still came through with the satisfaction of getting that last achievement of getting all achievements. This game will forever hold a special place in my heart and it truly deserves GoTY 2001.

author: {'steamid': '76561198186865498', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 82, 'playtime_forever': 60, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 60, 'last_played': 1484519473}
review: Okay, how does one review this game? If you fancy tapping a jar of mayo for 10,000 clicks of your mouse while unlocking weird "stories" along the way then this is an easy way to pile up 50 achievements in about an hour. A zany, offbeat little game which is worth a purchase simply to show off to people how cool gamers can be.

Infelizmente as três últimas conquistas ([spoiler] The Crown Movie Pun, An Ingredient To Rule Them All e What Do We Do Now? [/spoiler]) são muito entediantes de conseguir, então, use auto-click, mesmo que seja feio, é necessário.

author: {'steamid': '76561198211189491', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 13, 'playtime_forever': 18, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 18, 'last_played': 1488831238}

author: {'steamid': '76561198030414441', 'num_games_owned': 992, 'num_reviews': 39, 'playtime_forever': 234, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 234, 'last_played': 1483659320}
review:
You just click on a jar of mayo under different guises and props, some of which are based on clever word play. There are a few story "arcs" which demand you to click sequentially through a number of guises (e.g. mayo as a kid, then she grew up, then she became rebellious, etc). The entire content of the game (including all achievements) requires exactly 10,000 mouse clicks. This is what you are paying $1 for, to click 10,000 times on a virtual weirdly sexualized mayo jar.

I played it between multiplayer matches to pass the time and still found it dull.

author: {'steamid': '76561198130075424', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 7, 'playtime_forever': 39, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 39, 'last_played': 1483575103}

author: {'steamid': '76561198300270231', 'num_games_owned': 5388, 'num_reviews': 894, 'playtime_forever': 164, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 146, 'last_played': 1527523882}
review:
인생은 마요네즈인가 아니면 마요네즈가 인생인 것인가 [b]《마이 네임 이즈 마요》[/b]는 나에게 그러한 생각을 불러일으키는 게임이다. 그리고 덤으로 손가락의 경련까지 함께.

 [i]마요 마요[/i] 사지[i]마요[/i]
 도전과제 헌터가 아니라면 사지[i]마요[/i]
 카드 농사꾼이 아니라면 사지[i]마요[/i]
 단순한 걸 싫어하는 사람은 하지[i]마요[/i]
 클리커 게임 싫어하는 사람도 하지[i]마요[/i]
 내 손가락아 멈추지[i]마요[/i]
 10,000회 클릭이 코앞인데 멈추지[i]마요[/i]
 
확실히 내가 도전과제에 미친 놈이라 망정이지, 안 그랬으면 다른 1,100원 이하의 게임들과 비교했을 때 하위권에 속하는 게임이라는 건 명백하다. 그래도 짧은 플레이 타임으로 도전과제와 트레이딩 카드를 얻었으니 추천은 박도록 하겠다.

author: {'steamid': '76561197996186819', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 95, 'playtime_forever': 72, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 72, 'last_played': 1483333539}
review:
This game lol. Is like Kellogg's Special K. It's just right. For 96 cents USD you can get about an hour of clicker fun out of it.

The aesthetics of the game is quite pleasing, reminds me of the artwork in Braid. The music is like the "Bewitched" TV show intro. All happy and whimsical.

The story comes in the form of achievements once you click the mayo jar a number of times, it unlocks the next part. Often in a non-linear way, depending on which achievement you click on to follow. You'll follow the mayo's sex life, the mayo's music band adventure, hear the mayo's philosophy on life...

I suppose it's all about observing someone growing up through life and discovering amusing random trivia along the way.

Mouse macro really helps. But the top 30 in the leaderboards more than likely modified their save game to upload an insane clicker score.

author: {'steamid': '76561198040830662', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 63, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'last_played': 1527445673}
review:
"My Name is Mayo" ist ein im Februar 2016 veröffentlichter Clicker von Green Laval Studios, der den Egoismus der Gesellschaft des 21. Jahrhunderts persifliert.

Das Werk übergibt dem Spieler zu Beginn sofort die Fähigkeit zu handeln. Im Gegensatz zu anderen Spielen seiner Zeit (s. alle anderen Spiele), lässt "My Name is Mayo" den nicht erst in ein Menü, sondern gibt ihm die Möglichkeit die Möglichkeiten des Spielen sofort zu erforschen. Dadurch wird von der ersten Sekunde an vermittelt, dass es sich bei "My Name is Mayo" nicht um ein Spiel handelt, dass sich an Standards hält und die Gewohnheit brechen möchte.
Der Spieler ist nun in der Lage das Spiel zu erkunden. Ein Klick mit der linken Maustaste löst eine Reaktion des Mayonnaise-Glases vor einem aus. Ein gläserner Klang ertönt. In der oberen rechten Ecke erscheint die Zahl "1".
Der Spieler hat etwas erreicht. Das Gefühl des Erfolges wird durch die Zahl vermittelt, doch gleichzeitig auch ein Wunsch nach mehr. Der Wunsch nach mehr und zahlreiche Fragen kommen auf. Das Interesse an der Reichweite des Zählers erblüht. Dieser Vorgang ist eine Metapher für eine mögliche soziale Interaktion zwischen Menschen. Man sieht einen Menschen und reagiert. Darauf reagiert das Gegenüber. Wenn diese Reaktion ansprechend ist, dann reagiert man selber erneut.
Man wagt einen nächsten Schritt. Ein erneuter Klick wird getätigt. Man überwindet die Angst, dass die Interaktion ein Fehlschalg wird. Je mehr man klickt, desto stärker konzentriert man sich auf das Glas Mayonnaise vor einem. Die Metapher lässt sich fortführen. Das Gegenüber wird einem bekannt. Man erfährt mehr. Man lernt Details kennen.
Während des Erforschens des Gegenübers öffnet sich das Glas Mayonnaise langsam aber sicher.
Pop-Ups berichten von trivialen Fakten und Story-Anfängen. Beginnt man eine der Storys erhält man Monolog-Zeilen des Gegenübers. Das Glas Mayonnaise erzählt Geschichten und macht Witze. Doch damit es mehr erzählt muss man weiter klicken und sich immer weiter überwinden. Der Klick-Zähler steigt auf 1.000, doch man will mehr erfahren. Nach einiger Zeit muss man vielleicht die Hand wechseln, weil ein Finger nicht mehr will, doch man will weiter klicken. Wieder wird vereutlicht, dass eine Kommunikation einige Anstrengung mit sich bringen und Überwindung kosten kann.
Die einzelnen Story-Pfade behandeln Themen wie Sexualität, Zukunfts- und Selbstfindungsängste und Egoismus. Diese Theme sind im 21. Jahrhundert allgegenwärtig. Es gibt zahlreiche Menschen, die in der Fülle von Persönlichkeiten nicht mehr zu sich selbst finden können und sich dadurch in einer Chraktereigenschaft vertiefen und somt zu einseitigen Persönlichkeiten werden, die sie wohlmöglich nie sein wollten, ohne es zu merken. In Folge dessen muss unter Umständen auch zu professioneller Hilfe gegriffen werden. Die Angebotsdichte für psychologische Hilfe sind dadurch seit 2011 um 25% gestiegen.
Man lauscht den Geschichten und reagiert darauf mit Betätigung der Maus-Taste. Viele verschiedene Persönlichkeiten kommen dem Spieler entgegen. So ist es auch im Leben. Man lernt mit dem Laufe der Zeit viele verschiedene Menschen kennen, die alle ihre eigene Geschichte zu erzählen haben.
Während der Erzählungen streift das Glas-Mayonnaise verschiedene Verkleidungen, wie bespielsweise einen Bikini oder eine E-Gritarre über. Doch das Glas Mayonnaise bleibt stets erkennbar. Erneut wird klar, dass der Vergleich mit einem Menschen besteht. So sieht jeder Mensch anders aus, doch sind wir im Inneren alle gleich.
Mit dem Fortschreiten des Spieles erscheinen immer mehr Fakten, wie z.B. "Even if you don't like mayonnaise, it's possible that it is in some of your favourite foods".
Nachdem man alle verschiedenen Persönlichkeiten und ihre Geschichten kennen gelernt hat, erscheint nach 10.000 Klicks die letzte Botschaft. Der Deckel des Glases erhebt sich. "Open yourself to others... Just like you opened this jar of Mayo!", wird nun verkündet. Die Botschaft ist eindeutig in Form von einem Imperativ formuliert, der aber durch drei Punkte abgechwächt wird. Die Aufforderung klingt wie ein elterlicher Rat, der von Herzen kommt. Man solle sich öffnen, genau so wie man das Glas Mayonnaise geöffnet hat. Die Nachricht vereinfacht, den Vorgang des "Öffnens", da es eigentlich einfach ist ein echtes Glas Mayonnaise zu öffnen. Doch in Wirklichkeit hat es den Spieler 10.000 Klicks und viel Zeit gekostet. Sich zu öffnen klingt wie ein einfaches Vorhaben, was es aber in Wirklichkeit nicht ist. Viel lieber möchte man vorher aufgeben, weil es zu anstregend ist und für einen selbst danach einfacher. Man ist egoistisch. Anstatt sich mit anderen Menschen zu beschäftigen und sich ihnen zu öffnen, geht man lieber weg und spielt vielleicht ein Computerspiel. Doch das Computerspiel "My Name is Mayo" möchte, dass man aus dem Haus geht, mit Menschen redet, sich ihnen öffnet und ihre Geschichten hört, weil jeder Mensch eine andere Geschichte hat und anders aussieht, wir aber im Inneren alle gleich sind und uns verstehen und unterstützen sollten.

"My Name is Mayo" wünscht sich eine offenere und soziale Gesellschaft, die sich unterstützt. Dazu lässt es den Spieler langsam die Geschichten von verschiedenen Charakteren erforschen, die eine zwischenmenschliche Konversation wiederspiegeln.
Meiner Meinung nach ist "My Name is Mayo" ein sehr gelungenes Werk, da es eine Botschaft vermittelt, die ich vollkommen unterstütze.

author: {'steamid': '76561198008965640', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 106, 'playtime_forever': 104, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 23, 'last_played': 1476307294}
review:
I have never been so emotionally involved in a story before. My Name is Mayo takes a gothic-style, noir twist on the classic genre of mystery horror.
Set in an alternative Universe, there are only two beings left. The first is you, a disembodied hand, searching for truth. The second is Mayo. In this intense, psychological thriller, you take a trip through time to explore the dark history of Mayo, and discover just what secrets lie under the lid.

author: {'steamid': '76561198091595412', 'num_games_owned': 311, 'num_reviews': 25, 'playtime_forever': 94, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 94, 'last_played': 1482585121}
review:
Will the real Mayo please stand up?
I repeat:
Will the real Mayo please stand up?
We're gonna have a problem here.


So, the game "My Name is Mayo" is another unique game like Montaro, Greyfox and so on.
The concept of the game is basic and easy-to-understand.
You... well, you just click on a mayonnaise jar.
And that's it.

Or is it really?

You get achievements after clicking the hell out of the jar and there won't be happening anything after a while.
This is the moment you might be wondering if you cleared the game already.
YOU'RE WRONG!
Click on the achievements you find on the top left corner and you'll be surprised... Won't tell you more than that.

This game has a story which is deep stuff and you will most probably end this game asking yourself why you spend your couple of cents on this.

You did so, because you either love mayo or you don't. Easy as that.


Well, do I recommend this game?
I would not recommend it, but since it has a little fun included you might spend your single buck on virtual mayo instead of that ice cream.

author: {'steamid': '76561198289054523', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 9, 'playtime_forever': 2096, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 378, 'last_played': 1495561282}
review:
Ce jeu est parfait si vous êtes un grand chasseur de succès. En effet le jeu consiste à seulement cliquer un certain nombre de fois sur un pot de mayo qui vous fera débloquer de nombreux succès très rapidement. 

Les succès servent également de mini histoire, en effet certain succès une fois débloqué, il ne faut pas oublier de les sélectionner dans le jeu, afin de pouvoir continuer la suite de la petite histoire lui concernant. 

Rien de compliqué sur ce jeu, il vous faudra juste cliquer un certain nombre de fois sur le pot de mayo afin de pouvoir débloquer d'autres succès, qu'il vous faudra également encore sélectionné dans le jeu, pour débloquer la suite de la mini histoire lui correspondant. 

Compter entre 30 minutes à 1h00 pour atteindre le 100%.

author: {'steamid': '76561198040884867', 'num_games_owned': 2434, 'num_reviews': 901, 'playtime_forever': 50, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 41, 'last_played': 1494718048}
review:
[b]While nearly all clicker-style games are 'dumb', [i]My Name is Mayo[/i] at least investigates an interesting conceptual question, as well as having a [i]Ren and Stimpy[/i] style humor and artwork.[/b]

The question is [i]how many times do you have to tap a mayo jar to unscrew the lid?[/i] just let that fester in your brain for a quick minute.

Stating the obvious - the gameplay is purely clicking. There is no 'game' proper. The entertainment value comes from seeing the wonky artwork and quirky dialogue. This title will entertain you for exactly one very short afternoon. There isn't any replay value as far as I can tell, and it doesn't have super super grindy long-term goals like other clickers. [i]Is it worth a buck?[/i] I think so, but opinions will vary.

review:
This...this isn't a game.  I'm not sure exactly what it is, but it isn't a game.  There's no luck or skill to reach the end, only determination and a low threshold for what counts as amusing...so me.  
  
At less than a thousand clicks in, I wondered just what kind of psychological experiment or absurdist troll that I am Mayo could be.  Whatever the intentions of the creator(s), I am Mayo is a masterpiece.  The creator(s) earned my dollar and you should give them a dollar, too.

review:

author: {'steamid': '76561198081145379', 'num_games_owned': 738, 'num_reviews': 118, 'playtime_forever': 252, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 252, 'last_played': 1479678066}
review:
Un clicker MUY simple, gracioso, y muy bien acabado a nivel de detalle (estética, música).
Un juego en el que simplemente vas haciendo click en un bote de mayonesa y cada X clicks, se descubre un nuevo logro, con una pequeña "historia" y una nueva imágen.
No tiene mucho más.

Un juego gracioso pero... cansa, y se hace MUY monótono para la poca "recompensa" que ofrece.
Además, está sólo en inglés. Son pocos textos, pero si no conoces el idioma, te pierdes la mitad de la gracia.

Al final, por lo poco que aporta, y lo mucho que se tarda en completar el juego, te deja con la sensación de haber tirado el tiempo a la basura...

-----------------------------------------------------

PD: un consejo; si lo juegas desde PC, puedes pulsar la barra espaciadora y hacer click a la vez. Lo harás la mitad de rápido. Y si no, utiliza algún programa de click automático tipo "AutoHotkey" para no morir en el intento. xD

author: {'steamid': '76561198063392506', 'num_games_owned': 2773, 'num_reviews': 34, 'playtime_forever': 45, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 42, 'last_played': 1527514808}
review:
Nun ja, "My Name is Mayo" ist ein Clickerspiel mit "Story".

Bei diesem Spiel sieht man konstant ein Mayonnaiseglas vor sich und muss mit dem Cursor darauf klicken.
Für jeden erreichten Meilenstein bekommt man einen Fakt (Weiß nicht ob die wirklich stimmen) oder ein neues Outfit für das besagte Mayoglas. 

Damit sind wir schon an dem Punkt angekommen, wieso ich dieses Spiel bis zum letzten Achievement gespielt habe. Man kann seine Mayonnaise in verschiedene Outfits stecken. Dies sieht teilweise sogar recht lustig aus, verliert sich aber nach den ersten 10 - 20 Klicks auch wieder. 

[u]Ein Vorteil hat das Spiel:[/u]
Für jemanden der Achievements jagt ist dieses Spiel super geeignet. Er muss nur 10.000 mal auf die Mayonnaise klicken und ein paar mal die Outfits wechseln. Jeder Meilenstein ist nämlich ein Achievement.

[b][u]Fazit:[/u][/b] Für 0,99 € ganz ok... würde es mir aber nicht selber kaufen und für Achievement-Jäger ein schnelles Spiel für Zwischendurch.

author: {'steamid': '76561198208927805', 'num_games_owned': 376, 'num_reviews': 118, 'playtime_forever': 69, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 69, 'last_played': 1527407858}
review:
Eine Mayonnaise, ein Wort: unterhaltsam!
Es kostet 99ct (habs für 50 ct bekommen) und bietet 30-300 Minuten Unterhaltung. Es geht um Mayo- auf die man klickt und neue Outfits freischaltet. Nebenbei bekommt man bei einer gewissen Klickzahl einen Randomfact. Das Spiel bietet 4 Handlungsstränge die durch klicken im jeweiligen Outfit freigeschaltet werden können. Nebenbei gibts einiges an wertvollen Sammelkarten und man kann JEDES von den 50 Achievements leicht bekommen- bis auf das letzte 10.000 Klicks.
Viel Spaß
10/10

author: {'steamid': '76561197979226877', 'num_games_owned': 1429, 'num_reviews': 49, 'playtime_forever': 47, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 47, 'last_played': 1473695980}
review:
To say that "My name is Mayo" changed my life is to do it a spectacular injustice.

I've tried to go back to tapping mayo in the real world, but in the end I couldn't... it's just not the same.  I deeply miss the witty banter I've had with the Mayo and without that, there is no way I can be complete.  I came into this game expecting to find $0.99 of game play and what did I find (other than about an hour of $0.99 game play)? The universe, transcendence, my soul has blossomed.

I shall never view Mayo the same way again.  God Speed Mayo.  God Speed.

author: {'steamid': '76561198090691647', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 59, 'playtime_forever': 80, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 80, 'last_played': 1472594972}
review:
Vorrei scrivere una recensione decente ma il problema è... che COSA dovrei scrivere esattamente?
Partiamo dal presupposto che è sicuramente un ottimo gioco... per sfogare la frustrazione! Insomma, non avete mai sognato di picchiettare un barattolo di maionese? Eh? Ma... come sarebbe a dire NO?! Beh, effettivamente nemmeno io... Il punto è che non c'è un punto. Nemmeno una virgola... cosa ne sto facendo della mia vita?

PRO
- Poco costoso e intrattiene abbastanza (io mi sono divertita in quei 50 minuti di gioco scarsi a finire tutti gli archivi)
- Carino il sistema per sbloccare gli archivi successivi (a parte il 'clicca un tot di volte', si è praticamente obbligati a selezionare le piccole "storie" con i vari "outfit" per il nostro barattolo)
- OMG c'è un messaggio finale! (Questo lascio a voi scoprirlo, altrimenti che gusto c'è?)

CONTRO
- Non è Ketchup, purtroppo.

Oh, se può essere sexy anche un barattolo di maionese io non so che state aspettando a giocarci! ~❤

author: {'steamid': '76561198079942314', 'num_games_owned': 829, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 46, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 46, 'last_played': 1472542847}
review:
I really don't know what to say about this game. If you love condiment jars dressed in sexy leopard bikinis and love clicking your mouse rythemically against the cool smooth surface of mayo jars, then this is for you! 

In all serious though, being a silly game, don't have expectations too high. Be prepared to potentially beat your mouse into submission and get finger cramps...if that can..happen..

the little tiny "stories" are in the achievements themselves, which is kinda cool and original. 

This is probably the easiest and fastest game to get a perfect score. 

So if you have a disturbing love for mayo in raunchy outfits, want to add finger day to your gym regime and love cats, dogs and poops falling all across the jar, then WHAT ARE YOU WAITING FOR? I know you're mayo cortex is quiverin'.

终于有一天勺子断了233
主人公松了一口气
然而杀人魔从衣服里拿出了另一把勺子……[/spoiler]

没错，以上就是我的感受……[Doge脸]

author: {'steamid': '76561198008480668', 'num_games_owned': 1482, 'num_reviews': 79, 'playtime_forever': 982, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 60, 'last_played': 1474783400}
review:
Dieses Klick "Abenteuer" ermöglicht es Ihnen, die Klick-Fähigkeit der Maus zu testen, weil Sie genau 10.000 Klicks benötigen, um das Spiel zu beenden. Diese Erfahrung wird als Simulation eines realen Abgreifen des Mayo Glas beschrieben.
Während Sie verschiedene Teile des Glases klicken, wird seine Geschichte von seinem großen Wissen entdeckt.
Meine Name ist Mayo klingt wie das perfekte Spielerlebnis für Sie, aber was sind Sie bereit dafür zu opfern um die Freude aus diesem Glas Mayo zu erleben?
Diese einzigartige Erfahrung kostet Sie nichtmal 1€.
Sie denken jetzt man könnte dieses Geld auch für einen guten Zweck spenden oder auf irgendeine andere Weise ausgeben, aber wie könnte man dieser Mayo wiederstehen?

Pro:

+Testen Sie Ihre Maus
+erfahren Sie mehr über Mayo und Gläser
+Holen Sie sich einfach Errungenschaften
+unglaubliche Erfahrung

Nachteile:

-1 Stunde Ihres Lebens verloren
-erfahren Sie mehr über Mayo und Gläser
-vielleicht zerstören Sie Ihre Maus?

Jetzt sind Sie definitiv bereit diese Delikatesse zu versuchen, Nicht wahr?

author: {'steamid': '76561198125464449', 'num_games_owned': 392, 'num_reviews': 14, 'playtime_forever': 80, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 80, 'last_played': 1472304615}
review:
누군가에게나 숨겨진 취미는 있는 법이지요. 그러니까, 숨어서 하는 "무언가" 말입니다. 당신이 숨어서 하는 아이돌 팬질 같은 거요.
익명의 힘을 빌려서 고백하자면 제게도 그런 숨겨진 취미가 있습니다. 그…, 치는 겁니다. …마요네즈를요. 네. 당신이 아는 "그" 마요네즈.
이유는 모릅니다. 전 그저, 항상 제 여가 시간에 마요네즈 병을 쳐야한다고 생각했을 뿐입니다. 부모님의 말씀을 빌어보자면 저의 그런 마요네즈 성애는 아주 어릴 적부터 시작되었다고 하더군요. 아니 저… 성애가 아니라, 그러니까, 음, 취미가요.

…그래요. 여기까지 공개되었는데 무엇을 더 무서워하겠습니까? 탁 터놓고 말하죠. 저는 마요네즈를 사랑합니다! 혹자는 저의 이 마요네즈 사랑이 마요네즈 병의 디자인만 보고 하는 외모지상주의에 불과하다고도 하지만 그렇지 않습니다! 저는 마요네즈 존재 자체를 사랑하고 있습니다. 마요네즈가 공장제든 수제든 상관하지 않는단 말입니다!

그런 내 사랑 마요네즈가 가득 담긴 병을 상상해보세요, 얼마나 사랑스럽습니까?
어떤 이들은 아름다운 이는 지켜주고 바라봐줘야만 한다고 하지만 저는 그렇게 생각하지 않습니다. 우린 서로 함께하며 즐거움을 나눠야만 합니다. 그러니까, 마요네즈 병 치기 같은 거 말이지요.
한 번 해보세요. 마요네즈 병을 치다보면 얼마나 신이 나는 줄 모릅니다. 그리고 그러다보면 마요네즈 병이 진정으로 무엇을 원하는 지 알게 되죠. 

내 마요네즈들은 어쩜 그렇게 여러 매력을 가지고 있는지! 빨간 비키니를 입은 마요네즈를 보셨나요? 정말 저는 마요네즈의 무한한 가능성에 소름이 돋았습니다. 결국 마요네즈의 요청에 따라 병에 생크림과 체리로 된 비키니까지 입혀주었죠. 정말… 최고였어요. 아주 도발적이었죠.(그렇지만 솔직하게 우리끼리 하는 얘기를 해보면 역시 전 클래식한 빨간 비키니가 가장 섹시하게 느껴지더군요.)
그 외에도 우린 여러 가지 놀이를 즐겼어요. 마요네즈는 락스타가 되길 원하기도 했죠. 저는 영원한 팔로워가 되어주기로 약속했고요. 심지어 마요네즈는 "캐ㅊ-업"이라는 옷도 입어보기까지 했습니다! 아주, 새로운, 경험이었어요.

봐요, 사랑하는 마요네즈와 나는 소통하고 있다고요!


…엇?! 자, 잠시만요. 저기 내가 사랑하는 머스타드 병이 새롭게 리뉴얼 되어 나왔군요! 그럼 전 이만! 새로운 머스타드 병을 치려면 시간이 모자르니까요!

review:
It's a clicker game. Not much else

Pros -
If you're into achievements it's easy to get 100%

Cons -
Pretty much everything else

Bottom Line - 
This "game" is pretty awful. Clicker games can be fun and enjoyable. This one? Not so much. This is literally one of the only games I've ever considered trying to get a refund on.

author: {'steamid': '76561198044304707', 'num_games_owned': 224, 'num_reviews': 8, 'playtime_forever': 56, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 54, 'last_played': 1457069803}
review:
[h1][i] เมื่อความอินดี้มาถึงขีดสุด คนเล่นเกมจึงได้เสพย์งานบ้าๆบอๆแบบนี้ [/i][/h1]

เกมนี้จะให้คุณได้คลิก คลิกอย่างเดียว คลิกจนนิ้วล็อคเลยทีเดียว โอยยยยย

อย่าถามหาเนื้อเรื่อง หรือความสมเหตุสมผล หรือเหตุผลว่าอะไรดลใจผู้พัฒนาให้ทำเกมแบบนี้ออกมา

เสียงเพลงที่ออกแบบมาโคตรคุ้ม เพลงเดียวใช้ตลอดทั้งเกม โอ้วววหกำนร้ำวฟไำดาืฟวสกาดืว....

แต่ถึงกระนั้นก็ยังมีเสียงเอฟเฟคเมื่อคลิกถึงเหตุการณ์พิเศษด้วย น่าติ่นเต้นดีไหมล่ะ!!

บางทีเราก็สงสัยว่า เราคือผู้เล่น หรือเราเองคือไอ้โหลมายองเนสบ้านี่กันแน่

เอาจริงๆมันเป็นเกมที่กวนบาทามากถึงมากที่สุด ยิ่งอ่านภาษาปะกิดรู้เรื่องนี่แบบ WTF!!?

การล่า Achievement ในเกมนี้คือง่ายมากกกก!! ง่ายเกิ๊นนนน!!! คลิกครั้งแรกก็ได้มาอันนึงละ

หรือบางทีมันอาจจะแฝงข้อคิดเกี่ยวกับ ตัวตน การมีชีวิตอยู่ อะไรเทือกนี้ก็ได้ ใครจะรู้.....ใครจะไปรู้กับคุณมรึง!!

ถ้าเทียบกับราคาก็โอเคนะ ซื้อข้าวแกงได้ประมาณครึ่งจาน เอาจริงภาพ Artwork ในเกมก็ดูดีน้าา 

----------------------------------------------------------------

[h1][i]1 0 / 1 0 สำหรับผู้ที่เสาะแสวงหาสัจธรรมแห่งชีวิต[/i][/h1]
[h1][i]- 1 0 / 1 0 สำหรับผู้ที่ระดับสติปัญญาเหมาะไปอยู่ MIT[/i][/h1]

----------------------------------------------------------------

author: {'steamid': '76561198188887257', 'num_games_owned': 1411, 'num_reviews': 36, 'playtime_forever': 198, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 198, 'last_played': 1472137317}
review:
В этой игре представлено просто бесконечное множество майонезов, более 18 квинтиллионов банок со всех концов галактики!

В очень редких случаях, нажимая на майонез ты можешь встретить другого игрока!

В этом конгломерате идей ты сможешь тыкать по майонезу, и получать за это ресурсы, чтобы построить себе звездный майонез и улететь к другим майонезам!

Великолепнейший майонезный саундтрек готовый сопровождать тебя не только в процессе игры, но и во снах!

Всё в этой игре идеально, Вогоны одобряют.

author: {'steamid': '76561198025407995', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 337, 'playtime_forever': 54, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 54, 'last_played': 1472112874}
review:
I still cannot believe I have just spent one hour of my life clicking a jar of mayonaise for 10.000 times.
Would not recommend it again. xD
The vintage aestethics are great and it is a funny game.
Good buy for the price of one jar of mayonaise.

author: {'steamid': '76561197990992690', 'num_games_owned': 501, 'num_reviews': 59, 'playtime_forever': 210, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 27, 'last_played': 1475891762}
review:
Well... é estranho.... de uma forma positiva
O game é basicamente clicar infinitamente, mas você ganha archievements e segue sub-histórias (Mas continua clicando, não pense que vai fazer algo além disso) divertidas.

Pra quem gosta de Archievements, é um jogo bem divertido! 

Agora, se você não tem um Mouse da Bloody com Macro igual eu tenho eu definitivamente tenho pena de você se comprar. Seu mouse vai estragar e você vai ter caimbra e L.E.R. fodida no seu pulso.

A única coisa ruim do game foi o Overkill nos 3 archievements finais, acho que as historietas deveriam ter acompanhado com o número de cliques pra chegar até lá XP

Compre na promo!

author: {'steamid': '76561198102996375', 'num_games_owned': 246, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 11, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 7, 'last_played': 1590063085}

author: {'steamid': '76561198121829588', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 33, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 24, 'last_played': 1482183721}
review: Haven't finished this wonderful game yet, but man, is it a good one. Being apart of the Mayonnaise family, I am able to say that this game really turns me on when it comes to touching a jar of mayonnaise over and over, until I produce a little mayonnaise myself. You may think that this game looks bland, but it's worth the dollar or so that it costs. My favorite costume, without a doubt, is the whipped cream bikini. I could click on that all day if I were able to. At the end of the day though, after a long day of clicking on my native jar of mayonnaise that I call dad, I highly support and respect anyone that purchases this game and enjoys it as much as I do.

author: {'steamid': '76561198085309975', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 18, 'playtime_forever': 61, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 61, 'last_played': 1472059386}
review:
Riveting story, breathtaking graphics, and intense gameplay. My Name is Mayo is truly the pinnacle of human achievement where gaming is concerned.

And you will probably need a new mouse afterward.

author: {'steamid': '76561198089299679', 'num_games_owned': 7216, 'num_reviews': 392, 'playtime_forever': 299, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 299, 'last_played': 1472054827}
review:
Open yourself. Just like opening this jar of Mayo!

After 30+ minutes of spam clicking. I finnaly 100% this game.

Not much to it.. just click the jar.. earn achivement. Select newly acquired achivement. Dress up the mayo jar... Click the Jar and repeat. Very simple and straight forward.

No story, barely any music, nice sound effect, dress us mayo jar simulator.

Just run this game.. click 10k times. Get all the achievement then exit the game forever.

6.5/10.. A pointless clicker spam game for easy 100% achivement ratio.

author: {'steamid': '76561198023484674', 'num_games_owned': 6298, 'num_reviews': 40, 'playtime_forever': 1077, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1077, 'last_played': 1472018826}
review: It takes 10,000 clicks to complete the game, and not much happens along the way.  It has a fun aesthetic, but it has very little content even for a clicker game.  All that happens is you click for a while, unlock an achievement which gives the jar an 'outfit', then repeat.  Should definitely be free.  I might recommend it if it were free, but at the moment, a lot of better things are.

author: {'steamid': '76561198105128490', 'num_games_owned': 2891, 'num_reviews': 58, 'playtime_forever': 40, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 40, 'last_played': 1455709233}
review:
Оуууу да детка, это я, Банка с майонезом!
Ты хочешь меня!? Хочешь?! Я знаю, даааа…
Я, Банка с майонезом, ты знаешь кто я и для чего я тебе нужна!!!
Дааа, нужна, ведь я Банка с майонезом.
Хочешь я покажу тебе свои шикарные, шелковистые, длииииииииииннннннныыыыые, усы!!!
А ты видел меня в купальнике?! Нет?! А хочешь посмотреть на мой купальник?! нет?!(
Смотрииииииииииииииииииииииииииииии!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
А теперь я сниму с себя купальник, и выпущу все, содержимое, банки, заварного крема, на себя
На свою гладкую, твердую, круглую банку!!!
Ты хочешь меня!!! Постарайся, кликай, много кликай, сними с меня крышечку, давай, снимай же!!!
Возьми меня в мощные руки, потряси!! Даааа!!!
Хочешь посмотреть на моего слоника!?! давай, потрогай его, мммм…
Да детка, ты мой(я)!!!
Ты уже почти закончил(а), кликай больше, больше!!! Даааааа!!!
Кончай, кончай меня!!!
Открой, откупорь, лиши меня того, что я так берегла!!!
OOOOOOOMMMMMMMGGGGGGG, YEEEEEEESSSSSS!!!

Сразу скажу, с психикой у меня все норм)))
Но когда я играл, я только и делал что трахался с этой банкой!)

review:
3 часа я сидела и стучала пальцем по банке с майонезом. 3 часа , Карл. Моя кисть стала несгибаемой. После просмотра банки с майонезом в бикини, с усами,в стрингах или с накладными с*ськами, я стала понимать,что что-то в этой жизни не так... 
Кстати,выпало всего 2 карточки.на большее не хватило силы воли и нервов.

author: {'steamid': '76561198061582156', 'num_games_owned': 146, 'num_reviews': 14, 'playtime_forever': 200, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 200, 'last_played': 1470262641}
review:
Sit there and ask yourself "What's the best game of 2016?". You probably came up with all sorts of things like Overwatch, Dark Souls 3, Battlefield 1, and of course Pokemon GO. Well throw those horrible games out the window because My Name is Mayo is the only game you will ever need. Truly a magnum opus of the entire gaming industry and a testament to the power of human ingenuity. At the end of this wonderful 99 cent journey you will emerge as a better man, a champion of clicking, and a god of mayonnaise.

10/10

author: {'steamid': '76561198005024150', 'num_games_owned': 1878, 'num_reviews': 180, 'playtime_forever': 134, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 66, 'last_played': 1578310352}
review:

비록, 할인이라고 하더라도 왠만해서는 구입하지 않기를 권해드립니다.

[h1]I thought it will be a funny game, like "What's under your blanket"[/h1]

author: {'steamid': '76561198025540438', 'num_games_owned': 7104, 'num_reviews': 559, 'playtime_forever': 395, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 395, 'last_played': 1470114690}
review: You click the jar 10k times, then you win. Sometimes you get a cheevo with some flavor text, and sometimes the cheevos unlock little costumes for the jar. I feel like the cheevos were trying to make jokes, but if they were, none of them were funny. They'd maybe be funny in the same way that King of the Buttons was funny when I played it on Newgrounds when I was 13, but the fact is that most of the LoLS0R4ndumb humor you found funny when you were 13 watching flash animations just isn't funny to anyone aside from other 13 year olds.

author: {'steamid': '76561198058584412', 'num_games_owned': 9611, 'num_reviews': 204, 'playtime_forever': 102, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 102, 'last_played': 1469812178}
review:
Even if you know what you're getting into with this game, I still can't really recommend it.  If it goes on sale for 25 cents, you'll probably make your money back in cards, so there is that, and it works, there just could have been more.  The stories could have been fleshed out more, there could have been more facts, if you're paying attention and switching when you unlock the achievements, the slog from 4,500 clicks to 10,000 clicks is just long and boring.

While not a bad game, it's just shallow.  If you're looking for a cheap +1 to your game count, and 50 achievements you should get in an hour or so without really paying attention, then this game will do that.  You'll likely have to keep the game running longer than it takes to beat it if you want to get all the cards.  It is something mindless and easy to play while watching tv or a movie, though, so there is that.

All in all, there are better clicker games out there that are free, so I can't really recommend wasting an hour with this one.

author: {'steamid': '76561198234234796', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 7, 'playtime_forever': 40, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 37, 'last_played': 1490663528}
review:
Welcome to the retro world of My Name is Mayo, an obscure title that lives up to its name. An entertaining and hilarious, never-ending causal clicking game that will give you a craving for mayonnaise and aching finger workout that will make you come back for more clicking goodness! It’s a brilliant timewaster, a blast of fun, and a relaxing activity after long day of staring at the computer screen at work.

Plus checkout at all those achievements, you’ll be “Yee Gods, look at all the Achievements”! Each achievement tells a wild and (at times) a bizarre story about a Mayo Jar. From Random Facts about life to a banana, a censored mayo jar, and so on. You will be laughing your brains out from pure enjoyment of such a silly and joyful game!

I highly recommended it to anybody who loves causal games, comedy, or mayonnaise.

This game deserves 10/10 delicious jars of Mayo!

review:
[h1]Holy Mayo![/h1]

So...I'm not eating the mayo, I'm just tapping the jar over and over?
Wait, I'm not even doing that, I'm just [i]playing a game[/I] about tapping a jar over and over!

What is wrong with me?

[u]Play [I]My Name is Mayo[/I] if the following applies:[/u]
[list]
[*]You like absurdist humor
[*]You fantasize about the great, white condiment
[*]You want to earn 50 achievements in less than 20 minutes
[*]You like your clicker games with a bit more story and a bit less Ketchup
[/list]
10/10 Would stick a jar of mayo in my armpit again!

author: {'steamid': '76561198166645513', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 67, 'playtime_forever': 272, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 272, 'last_played': 1475329499}
review:
Avez-vous toujours rêvé d'être un pot de mayonnaise, un pot ayant ses problèmes personnels, ses humeurs, sa mentalité ? Oui ? Alors achetez ce jeu.

Il n'y a pas grand chose à dire sur [i]My name is Mayo[/i] en dehors du fait que vous aurez une bonne excuse pour vous acheter une nouvelle souris et de nouveaux doigts. Niveau graphismes on va pas se mentir c'est pas [i]Avatar[/i] ou le dernier film en 4K, mais ce petit pot de mayonnaise porte aussi son charme. De plus, la musique et les sons sont de bonne qualité, et gardent dans l'ambiance. Notons par ailleurs l'humour présent dans ce titre qui ne se prend pas au sérieux.

Pour résumer, j'évoquerai que ce jeu passe-temps a un bon rapport qualité/prix.

Note: 14/20

author: {'steamid': '76561198085641015', 'num_games_owned': 425, 'num_reviews': 10, 'playtime_forever': 251, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 31, 'last_played': 1666289780}
review: [b]Gra My Name is Mayo jest prostą grą o otwieraniu słoika z majonezem.[/b] Podczas jego odkręcania dane nam będzie wysłuchać kontemplacji nad sensem życia oraz wspomnień z dzieciństwa. Ponadto istnieje możliwość zmiany wyglądu/ubioru naszego słoju z majonezem. Poza tym gra pozwala nam na szybkie zdobycie 50 (wszystkich) osiągnięć, co pozwoli nam na zdobycie kolejnej perfekcyjnie ukończonej gry w swojej kolekcji. Osobiście polecam grę wszystkim zainteresowanym.

author: {'steamid': '76561198051045490', 'num_games_owned': 208, 'num_reviews': 16, 'playtime_forever': 105, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 40, 'last_played': 1581220560}
review: My friends bought this for me as a joke.  I got all the achievements in 40 minutes and now I get cards out of it too.  WHO'S LAUGHING NOW, HUH?

author: {'steamid': '76561198055801447', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 12, 'playtime_forever': 186, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 186, 'last_played': 1467088656}
review:
Du hast Lust deine Maus hinzurichten?
Du willst zum Arzt deines Vertrauens gehen um dir den Gelben Urlaubsschein zu holen wegen einer Sehnenscheidenentzündung? 
Du willst ein Spiel mit 100%  Errungenschaften für deine Sammelsucht?

Dann ist das DEIN Spiel!

Man hat einen Bildschirm mit einem Glas Mayonnaise in der Mitte, mehr gibts nicht zu sehen. Auf dieses Glas klickt man, solange bis man alle Achievments hat. Hat man die ersten, werden die nächsten im Optionsmenü freigeschaltet. Diese kann man dann anwählen, freispielen und das nächste auswählen. Nach ca. 1 Stunde hat man dann alle 50 Erfolge freigeschaltet, je nachdem ob man das Durchhaltevermögen besitzt fürs Dauerklicken oder vorher ob dieser Stumpfsinnigkeit dem Wahnsinn verfallen ist. Dann noch solange laufen lassen bis man die 3 Karten abgestaubt hat ( immerhin so ca 15 Cent wert ), und deinstallieren. 

Fazit: Mit einem SPIEL hats nix zu tun, aber perfekt für Achievmenthunter. Deshalb Daumen hoch!

review:
This is a good way to get 50 achievements in under an hour and under a dollar.  The stories in the achievements are kind of cute, but this really is just a clocking game, nothing else.  But you'll get a slight chuckle and 30-60 minutes of mild entertainment(depending on if you give up before completing). The trailer shows you exactly what you should expect out of this game.
I recommend because it's cheap, and I like silly crap.(and achievements and trading cards)

author: {'steamid': '76561198041287274', 'num_games_owned': 487, 'num_reviews': 75, 'playtime_forever': 47, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 47, 'last_played': 1466829308}
review:
First, I need to point out that I Hate Mayo, stems from my childhood.

Second, I found this game because of, you guessed it, Markiplier. Being on sale I grabbed it to get a nice and easy 100%. So take a look at the time spent playing, thats how long it took. Could have easily taken less if my macro worked right.

Yes I used a clicker... the game isn't worth destroying my mouse with over 10K clicks. If you don't mind or have a cheap enough mouse by all means speed through it, otherwise use a macro that works only a little bit.

author: {'steamid': '76561198030411235', 'num_games_owned': 548, 'num_reviews': 20, 'playtime_forever': 24, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 24, 'last_played': 1466716418}
review:
Still don't know why I bought this. Well, what a way to spend 0,79€.

+ Learn the story of a somewhat exhibitionistic mayonese
+ Earn 50 Steam achievements in 20 minutes using an auto-clicker (or waste your time and actually click)
+ enjoy a retro look in a horrible resolution with no graphic settings available (or did I miss something? Why do I even bother to ask, I've played it through)
- Elephant Mayo genitalia kinda put me off

9/10 would get 50 achievements again.

author: {'steamid': '76561198030516476', 'num_games_owned': 5534, 'num_reviews': 465, 'playtime_forever': 211, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 211, 'last_played': 1554550056}
review:
Trois ans après avoir joué à ce jeu, et dans un soucis de remanier mon évaluation de l'époque que je trouvais une peu trop courte et évasive, j'ai décidé de réinstaller et relancer le jeu.

Force est de constater que celui-ci a toujours ce même impacte qu'il a eu sur moi la première fois : il est tellement ridicule et tourné à la dérision qu'il a le don de susciter l'étonnement et l'amusement. Ce jeu a son lot de détracteurs et son lot de fans aussi... En tout cas ce qui est sur c'est qu'on se souvient encore de son titre.

Certains l'ont apprécié pour ses succès faciles et cartes à échanger, rien de plus, rien de moins. 
D'autres pour ses graphismes vintage qui lui octroient un certain charme ou pour son côté grotesque.  Et d'autres n'y ont rien trouvé de plus qu'un jeu débile où il faut seulement spammer un pot de mayonnaise en plein milieu d'un écran juste pour obtenir des succès.

Pour ma part, j'ai bien aimé ce petit "jeu" complètement barré. Après tout, que cherche-t-on dans dans un jeu si ce n'est des surprises et de la nouveauté nous permettant de nous évader du quotidien afin de se détendre et s'amuser.

Il n'est certes pas le jeu du siècle, ni celui sur lequel on s'acharnera des heures durant et d'ailleurs on y repérera tout de suite ses défauts majeurs. 
En effet,  à peine lancé et ceci dans une configuration qui est tout sauf du HD, que nous voici déjà projetés dans le vif du sujet sans aucune cinématique ou image d'introduction, ni aucun menu, ou encore  sans une quelconque indication nous expliquant pourquoi un pot de mayonnaise trône au milieu de l'écran et ce que l'on est sensés faire de ça.
Après, c'est sûr nul besoin d'être sortit de l'ENA pour comprendre qu'il suffit de cliquer dessus.

Je ne me passionne pas vraiment pour les jeux dit "clicker" mais ici j'ai bien apprécié le concept : cliquer un certain nombre de fois fait tomber des succès, pas seulement dans notre compte steam mais aussi dans le jeu. 
On peu ensuite aller les consulter en cliquant sur le bouton pause en haut de l'écran. Cliquer sur l'un d'entre eux aura pour effet de l'activer, et en les activant à tour de rôle dans un certain ordre tout en retournant cliquer sur notre pot de mayo, cela dévoilera une sorte d'arborescence et par le biais de quelques phrases, plusieurs petites histoires marrantes et saugrenues.

J'ai à l'époque, désinstallé le jeu un peu trop tôt et j'ai loupé une petite mise à jour qui ajoutais un petit bonus que j'ai découvert aujourd'hui. En utilisant le clic droit il y a une petit surprise qui n'est pas non plus phénoménale mais c'est un petit plus bien sympa.

That's all, rien de plus à expliquer, le jeu est très court, et il faut se munir d'une souris robuste et prévoir un massage intensif des doigts après avoir fini la partie.

Il n'y avait peut être pas de quoi en faire tout un plat, ni de rédiger un si long paragraphe pour si peu, mais j'avais comme l'envie subite de déterrer un vieux topique oublié et d'offrir un peu de lecture comme ça par plaisir.


[code][h1][b]Si vous avez apprécié cette évaluation et souhaitez en lire d'autres venez suivre ma [url=https://store.steampowered.com/curator/39072619/]page de curation[/url].[/b][/h1][/code]

author: {'steamid': '76561198072372214', 'num_games_owned': 1764, 'num_reviews': 46, 'playtime_forever': 209, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 209, 'last_played': 1464823205}
review:
This game is absurd, but I like it. It has a nice retro feel, a cheesy set of stories, random factoids, and a completely strange way of presenting it all. Story progression is done by selecting an achievement and resuming clicking. It would've been nice if the story achievements were somehow displayed on the main screen instead of having to go into the list and find the next one, but it was simple enough to blaze through them.

I highly recommend using an auto clicker. 10,000 clicks is murder for your hand and mouse.

---

author: {'steamid': '76561198045331223', 'num_games_owned': 1232, 'num_reviews': 438, 'playtime_forever': 291, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 127, 'last_played': 1489974077}
review:
This game is silly and entertaining :D

One huge con for me is that there aren't more customizations or effects to be unlocked.
A bigger one and the most frustrating is that I have a PC, along with my Bro, and GF, all three of us jump on the other PCs and the local files get erased.  For example, I was at 6000-7000 hits, and then my girlfriend jumps on, and gets hers to 1700.  I log back into my account, and I'm also at 1700 hits, that's very frustrating, given that I was only 3000hits away from all achievements.

author: {'steamid': '76561198172454749', 'num_games_owned': 2937, 'num_reviews': 313, 'playtime_forever': 93, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 47, 'last_played': 1467060354}
review:
[h1]도전과제를 위해서 태어난 게임[/h1]

언젠가 게임친구님들이 이 게임을 플레이를 할때는 예사로 생각했었는데,
요몇일전 세일과 함께 영입된 게임으로 단순히 클릭만해서 도전과제 50개를 하는 이런 게임은 정말 처음이다.
이 게임은 무료게임 중에 클릭커 히어로즈보다도 더 단순하다.
도전과제 50개 추가하라고 노골적으로 주는 게임같다.

길어도 1시간이면 50개의 도전과제가 모두 완료가 되는 게임으로
게임을 하다가 한동안 안하게 되면 리셋이 되는거같다.
게임을 하다가 몇일 안했더니 히트수가 다시 1부터 시작하는걸 볼수 있었다.

그런데, 마요네즈를 주인공이라는 것도 정말 쌩뚱맞다.
마요네즈를 계속 클릭하는 게임이라니...;;;
게임같지 않은 게임을 만들어내는 발상이 대단하다.
아마 북미나 유럽쪽 개발자가 만든 게임이 아닌가 싶다.

인지도가 높고 완성도가 높은 게임들은 일본이나 우리나라도 만들려면 만들어내지만
이런 단순한 소재꺼리로 게임으로 만들어낼려는 발상은 역시 서양사람들이 아니면 할수 없는 일이다.
독창적이고 창의적인 발상을 하는건 역시나 서양쪽이 앞선다.

가격대 비하면 단순 클릭하긴 하지만 괜찮은 게임이고
배경음악이나 마요네즈와 여타 부수적인것들이 참 재밌는 게임이라는 생각이든다.
게임을 하고 나면 손가락이 조금 아픈데, 왼손으로는 마우스를 오른손으로는 키보드 스페이스를 연타해서 빠르게 히트를 시키는 것도 빠르게 할수 있는 방법이다.
도전과제 추가할려면 필수적으로 해야 하는 게임!!!


가격대에 대비 평점 80점!! ^^

For what it's worth though, it's guranteed to make you smile! My boyfriend tells me that I play the weirdest games, so I am very glad to have added this game to the "weird games"  category!

author: {'steamid': '76561198076327839', 'num_games_owned': 186, 'num_reviews': 8, 'playtime_forever': 46, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 46, 'last_played': 1460674535}
review:
My Name is Mayo is a simple clicker game. Sit and click on a mayo jar for an hour or two to unlock acheivements. 

The "story mode" is activated by clicking on the jar while a prior achievement is selected, which changes the appearance of the jar. Some of the thresholds for achievements are very high, but it is extremely easy to max them out in a short period of time.

In the end, My Name is Mayo is nothing more than "filler" in your Steam library. Finish it once and never turn back. However, for only $0.99, the game is not too terrible a deal. I got it on sale for $0.49. This is pocket change, people. Nothing worth getting fired up about. In fact, sell off some of your inventory and you'll be able to purchase games like this in no time.

author: {'steamid': '76561197972039973', 'num_games_owned': 8254, 'num_reviews': 548, 'playtime_forever': 249, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 249, 'last_played': 1462657658}
review:
Du liebst Pommes mit Majo? Dann ist das genau das richtige Spiel für dich. Klicke auf der Majo Flasche bis dir schlecht wird vom grässlichem Sound und dem echt sinnlosem Spielprinzip. Warum ich mir das gekauft habe? Ja aus Langeweile und weil ich sehen wollte, ob man wirklich in 30 Minuten das Spiel durch hat. Ja das schafft man...

Mal ehrlich, wie langweilig war mir bloß? Verdammte Axt ich sollte was anderes mit meinem Leben anfangen.
Jetzt nur noch im Hintergrund laufen lassen, für die Sammelkarten...

Jetzt geh ich mit meinem Finger Spiegeleier braten...

author: {'steamid': '76561198034636336', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 19, 'playtime_forever': 114, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 114, 'last_played': 1461912190}
review:
If you want to perfectly emulate this game, watch the trailer while clicking your mouse on the bottle of mayo in the picture above the description. You have experienced the game and saved 99 cents.

The trailer gives you a good idea of the game's humor, which is the only selling point. Do you find it funny to see a jar of mayo with an emo haircut? What about dressed as a banana? If so, spend the dollar. You might get a few laughs. If not, don't bother.

To unlock all the achievements, you'll have to click the mayo 10,000 times. Clicking progresses you through little storylines. Getting through all of these will take you roughly 4,000 clicks. After that it's 6,000 clicks with nothing new or entertaining (again, opinion, maybe you find poop rain really amusing and that will be enough for you). When that's done, you just let it idle for cards. That's all there is.

I didn't find it fun or funny and, ultimately, it made me kind of sad.

author: {'steamid': '76561198193364095', 'num_games_owned': 631, 'num_reviews': 15, 'playtime_forever': 193, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 193, 'last_played': 1461844884}
review:
My Name is Mayo is a short clicker game that was gifted to me by a friend who knows that I prefer Mayonnaise over Ketchup. 
[spoiler] [b]Mayo > Ketchup[/b][/spoiler]

Just another cliché clicker game.
In my opinion, I found it very boring and I wouldn't recommend this game if you're looking for something that's going to [i]impact[/i] you in any sort.
This game is good enough to help you kill time.

My Name is Mayo has 50 achievements which is very easy to get. You'll be able to get 100% in one sitting so this game is obviously for you if you're an achievement hunter looking for easy achievements! The achievements require you to have a number of clicks to unlock it and some consists of a one-liner story which made me chuckle. Out of the 50 achievements, 12 of them are random facts and the rest are 4 different story plots which changes the ‘clothes’ of the Mayonnaise jar. 

The game also has trading cards sooo if you're someone who's in it for steam trading cards, go for this.

I'm not really asking for much since it's only a ฿29.00 / $0.99 game. 
It's a plain game where you have to click a jar several times to unlock achievements and that's all there is to it. Plus, repetitive music.
