author: {'steamid': '76561198056417167', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 24, 'playtime_forever': 347, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 347, 'last_played': 1461015298}
review:
[b][u]My Name is Mayo[/u] est selon moi un bon petit jeu![/b]
C’est plus une histoire qu’un jeu, car le but du jeu est de cliquer sur un pot de Mayonnaise pour débloquer des succès. Par contre, les succès racontent des histoires ridiculement drôles et qui piquent notre curiosité pour découvrir la suite et continuer à cliquer. Bien sûr, le jeu est très court, mais il reste très amusant.

author: {'steamid': '76561198147367577', 'num_games_owned': 253, 'num_reviews': 40, 'playtime_forever': 22, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 12, 'last_played': 1463876858}
review: So here's my review for "My Name is Mayo". It's a simple clicking game about you clicking on a jar of mayo with your finger, unlocking achievements so and on, and getting "stories" (from achievements) which just add an accessory to your jar of mayo. It really gets boring, but you should play it (IF YOU BOUGHT THIS OH MY GOD) as a time waster. Don't waste your money on this please, instead save it for your bright future and ACTUALLY WASTE IT ON A GOOD GAME.

author: {'steamid': '76561198022592631', 'num_games_owned': 9257, 'num_reviews': 311, 'playtime_forever': 455, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 300, 'last_played': 1460916066}
review: My Name is Mayo ist ein absurdes Spiel. Es ist eine Klickorgie sondergleichen, bei der man sich fragt, was denn noch sinnloser wäre als das, was man gerade macht... Aber für den Preis von 0,60€ und für diejenigen, die gerne ohne Mühen 100% Achievements bekommen wollen ist es ein guter Fang. Für alle anderen Gamer da draußen, die sich etwas tiefgründiges oder unterhaltsames wünschen ist es wohl nix und da gibts auch Spiele ums gleiche Geld, die etwas mehr hergeben. Würde daher einen Damen zur Seite geben, aber dafür müsste Man Valve wohl auch noch mit tausenden von Klicks belästigen, daher ein Daumen nach Oben.

author: {'steamid': '76561198118460535', 'num_games_owned': 8643, 'num_reviews': 179, 'playtime_forever': 237, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 50, 'last_played': 1524443143}
review:
这个游戏的成就足足有50个，而且相对来说比较容易解锁。
玩法就有够无聊，全程只需要按鼠标，得到成就之后，可以选择一个成就，然后继续点击鼠标，点到一定次数之后又会解锁新的成就，再选择新的成就，再继续点击鼠标。
每个成就的解锁需要10到500下点击不等，终极成就需要点上10000下。
我耐心的用手指在笔记本的触摸板上点了大概有5000下，然后祭出Joy2Key，点完了剩下的5000下。
连击设置成每秒12次就好，再多了也是白费劲，反而会慢。
别问我怎么知道是12次的…………
最后，看在这个游戏便宜，加上我真有够无聊地玩的份上，给个好评。

author: {'steamid': '76561198139328230', 'num_games_owned': 2324, 'num_reviews': 260, 'playtime_forever': 110, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 110, 'last_played': 1461326439}
review:
Here is the not so heroic journey of trying to open one friggin' stubborn mayonnaise jar, presented as a clicker game full with sarcastic achievements. Uhm... Okay. I won this game in a giveaway and tried it out of pure curiosity to begin with, which doesn't serve me right most of the time. Writing a review for this one will be a challenge. I really should appreciate the way developers' mind work here. Even now I'm trying to get my head together to think about something imaginative to say about a mayonnaise jar, and as absurd it may be, some people managed to make a whole game out of it!

Ehm... [i]My Name is Mayo[/i] is a clicker game - and aside not really being the most absurd one that I've ever seen in the market either, has a weird sense of humor targeting a selection of pop culture references wrapped in a vintage display. There is really nothing into it aside clicking on a mayonnaise jar while listening to the repetition of the same pesky 40s advertisement jingle tune. After a certain amount of clicking, you unlock short and absurd story paths for your mayonnaise jar and given the opportunity to dress it up in various accessories. As being the mission of any and all clicker games, your primary motivation here is to kill some brain cells while looking at your screen with empty eyes, silently drooling and clicking with your mouse to fill the illusion of you are actually doing something. Well done! It takes 10.000 clicks to collect all that there is within this game, never to visit again. If you are a strict achievement hunter and got it for an easy completion; sure, this is your game. You might consider running a script rather than actually clicking it through anyhow though.

Could I recommend it? Sure, why not if you strictly know what is it that you are getting here? I, myself prefer games with actual stories but also know first handedly the mindless therapeutic relaxation of being able to not think anything serious as a long time player of [i]Clicker Heroes[/i]. [i]My Name is Mayo[/i] is a perfect medium for that. The game deserves some appreciation for being humorous without being imposing, obnoxious or promising false depth anyhow. While we ponder on the philosophy, the boundless ethical and existential conflict hidden behind a mayonnaise jar, we keep clicking. Will we ever grasp the enlightenment?

Please also check out Lady Storyteller's Curator page [url=http://steamcommunity.com/groups/ladystoryteller#curation]here[/url] - follow for regular updates on reviews for other games!

author: {'steamid': '76561198049196395', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 86, 'playtime_forever': 93, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 92, 'last_played': 1527478111}
review: Very Positive? What is wrong with these people? This is a pointless clicker game. The only thing going for it is that it's super easy to get all the achievements and it has cards. I do not recommend this game unless you are into Steam cards. It's barely a game but yet it plays better than Bad Rats, go figure. I got all the achievements and wrote this review before all the cards dropped. I can't believe there is a leaderboard for this game with people clicking in the millions. This game is awful and you should feel awful. 1/10 if you want to waste your time with this piece of shovelware.

author: {'steamid': '76561198069011828', 'num_games_owned': 1457, 'num_reviews': 32, 'playtime_forever': 155, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 155, 'last_played': 1461433592}
review:
Dieses Spiel ist nix für ungeübte Gamer ! Mit Klickfingerkrampf ist nicht zu Spaßen !

My Name is Mayo ist dazu gut, um noch ein perfektes Spiel in der Statistik zu haben. Oder um der ollen PC-Maus mit der klickerei auf das Mayoglas den Rest zu geben. Das Spiel macht keinen Spaß, da hilft es auch nicht, wenn das Mayoglas einen Bikini und Schnautzbart trägt. Zum Glück ist die Hintergrund Dudelei nicht nervtötend.
Nach einer knappen Stunde klickerei hatte ich alle Achievements.
Danach nur noch laufen gelassen für die Karten und anschliessend deinstalliert.

author: {'steamid': '76561198068476306', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 59, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 42, 'last_played': 1467117405}
review:
Also das Spiel läuft astrein. Kein Lag, keine Bugs, keine Abstürze. Die Grafik ist in einer Zeichentrickoptik gehalten und sieht vollkommen in Ordnung aus. 

Ein kleiner Mangel in meinen Augen ist, dass Klicks, welche kurz unter dem Deckel plaziert werden, nicht gelten. Dafür werden Klicks, welche unter den unteren Ecken plaziert werden, als Treffer gewertet, obwohl an dieser Stelle definitiv kein Glas mehr ist. Eventuell sollte hier in kommenden Updates oder Pacthes nachgebessert werden.

Ansonsten hält das Spiel, was es verspricht. Klicke zehntausendmal auf die linke Maustaste. Mehr nicht...sinnlos vielleicht...aber es wird auch nirgendwo etwas anderes behauptet :P

author: {'steamid': '76561198166510048', 'num_games_owned': 160, 'num_reviews': 12, 'playtime_forever': 205, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 182, 'last_played': 1461681070}
review:
И вот я прошёл эту игру в жанре - "Казуальная игра". Это игра о банке с майонезом. Суть её в том, чтобы выполнять разные квесты, зарабатывать ачивки, и тем самым приближаться к финальной ачивке и открытию этой самой банки.
В этой игре мы должны будем выполнять задания, идти по 4 квестовым веткам, тем самым открываю заветную банку с майонезом.
[b]Давайте отметим плюсы данной игры: [/b]
+ Множество заданий, игра не даст заскучать.
+ Отличный таймкиллер.
+ Множество лёгких ачивок.
+ Много позитива.
+ Карточки окупают игру.
+ Довольно приемлимая цена для такой игры. (Брал за 17р.)
[b]Минусы: [/b]
- Придётся долго сидеть в игре для того, чтобы выбить карточки. (У меня ушло на это около 2,5-3 часов.)
- Нет русского языка, хотя впринципе там и так всё понятно, но всё равно это минус. (Да там вообще кроме английского никакого языка нет.) 
Вообщем в целом кликер отличный, стоит своих денег. Всем советую купить и поиграть.
Рекомендую, 10/10 сломанных мышек!
P.S. Самое быстрое прохождение игры, за всю мою игровую историю.
P.S.S. Карточки выбиваются дольше, чем проходится игра. Лол.
P.S.S.S. Посмотрите рекомендуемые системные требования к игре - поржёте.
http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=412611650

review: Juego estupido del año... o de la decada, me gustan los clicker, pero esto ya es basura. Que tenga tantos votos positivos es una conspiración. A mi me gusto Dear Esther, me gusta el minimalismo. Que no te engañen, eso es una basuda disfrazada de modernismo.

author: {'steamid': '76561198034183306', 'num_games_owned': 1779, 'num_reviews': 104, 'playtime_forever': 138, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 43, 'last_played': 1463216666}
review:
The fact this got on steam is a sign of how poor the QA is.

Games that are plain crap? Okay, there is /some/ leniency there. Just a little.

A game that you do nothing but click 10,000 times for no benefit? No. This is not a game. This garbage belongs in a bin.

At least in other clicker games - even the trashiest, like Sakura Clicker - you have to upgrade and progress. This, you click 10000 times and pop achievements.

The fact someone is charging for it is offensive.

author: {'steamid': '76561198059934690', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 88, 'playtime_forever': 13, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 13, 'last_played': 1461039635}
review:
Not worth paying money for, but has a few very small redeeming qualities.


+Waste time on getting 100% achievements
+Leave game running for trading cards
+Chuckle at literal interpretations of figures of speech and other silliness
+Takes at most 10 minutes to finish if using an autoclicker (highly recommended to avoid RSI)
+Makes you re-evaluate your life ("WTF did I just buy and finish this when I already knew it would be just me clicking 10,000 times?")
+It has leaderboards in case you're that autistic


-Go slowly insane after hearing the mayo jar "clink" sound effect 10,000+ times (mute the sound ASAP)
-Realise you're not getting those minutes of your life back (Steam doesn't refund time)

review: Hm this game.... *CLICK* *CLICK* *CLICK* *CLICK* *CLICK* *CLICK* *CLICK* *CLICK* *CLICK* *CLICK* *CLICK* *CLICK* *CLICK* *CLICK* *CLICK* *CLICK* *CLICK* *CLICK* *CLICK* *CLICK* *CLICK* *CLICK* *CLICK* *CLICK* *CLICK* *CLICK* *CLICK* *CLICK* *CLICK* *CLICK* *CLICK* *CLICK* *CLICK* *CLICK* *CLICK* *CLICK* *CLICK* *CLICK* *CLICK* *CLICK* *CLICK* *CLICK* *CLICK* *CLICK* *CLICK* *CLICK* *CLICK* *CLICK* *CLICK* *CLICK* *CLICK* *CLICK* *CLICK* and thats all you have to do :D

author: {'steamid': '76561198223473928', 'num_games_owned': 2076, 'num_reviews': 77, 'playtime_forever': 130, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 130, 'last_played': 1460609267}
review:
非常纯粹的一款点击类游戏。

整个游戏的全部玩法就是对着一瓶蛋黄酱狂点，解锁成就，然后拉开成就列表点击你已经完成的成就，给蛋黄酱换一个装扮，继续点击指定的次数，解锁新的成就。如此循环。

我不明白这款游戏存在的意义是什么，简介里说能在点击蛋黄酱的过程中(maybe)明白人生的道理。[strike] 但是我想学习人生的真理可以去看鸡汤文啊	[/strike]

下面我来强行找找这款游戏的优点吧
·有多达50个非常容易达成的成就[spoiler] 正在玩的疯狂的麦克斯才49个成就，50个小时完成的还没这个游戏20分钟完成的多	[/spoiler]
·价格便宜
·有卡牌

这个游戏可能只对我这种成就党来说有意义吧，否则买回来只能是喜加一，完全没有任何游戏性可言。

[spoiler] 首页看到的5个有价值的评价全是差评，难道这个特别好评是刷的？[/spoiler]

author: {'steamid': '76561198083986170', 'num_games_owned': 1021, 'num_reviews': 22, 'playtime_forever': 38, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 38, 'last_played': 1460548334}
review:
Locked at 30fps. Literally unplayable.

But really, this isn't a game. more so than most clickers, and that's saying something. want 50 achievements and a broken hand for the low low price of 99cents? go for it. Literally the only unlocks are achievements. And those are titled to supposedly tell stories. but really it's just making bad jokes and changing the jar a bit with either new labels or putting it in bikinis…

author: {'steamid': '76561198004630254', 'num_games_owned': 1791, 'num_reviews': 45, 'playtime_forever': 702, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 702, 'last_played': 1460389588}
review:
This game is a joke. The punchline? Those who have been giving it negative reviews.

It's an amusing distraction that, by its' very existence, is a commentary on the inanity of clicker games and achievement hunting. There are also little "story modes" as you progress your clicks that are quite worth the time. 

The description makes it clear what this game is all about. So for people to come on here complaining that it's not really a game, that it's a waste of time....you've just added to the layers of this creation, and I thank you for it.

review: 不是很懂这个游戏，似乎只是一直点点点点。就游戏流程来说相当无聊，但其中也包含了一定的解谜（？）要素，所以还是比较耐玩的，可以在无聊的时候随手点点。50个steam成就强行组织了数个剧情，包含了黑色幽默，也有人生哲理，总而言之的话，作为一款休闲游戏，还是比较推荐的。

author: {'steamid': '76561198043141500', 'num_games_owned': 4721, 'num_reviews': 19, 'playtime_forever': 35, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 35, 'last_played': 1460104743}
review:
It's the only clicker I've met that comes with the decency of honesty: it very barely asks you to click on a jar of mayo 10000 times. No "your hero becomes stronger by your equally heroic click finger", no "each click will hoard delicious resources". Nothing that became the gaming sickness of the last years (let's leave aside the *philosophical* problem of most of our games just making us click on stuff). Clickers are strange games, and like good old cow clicker, Mayo is more a parody of your run-of-the-mill fingerbreaker than a true game.

But it is parody with some nicely drawn images and a few hilarious moments in its micronarratives. Pick it up on sale because it really is overpriced at a dollar. But in a sale, why not. Use an auto-clicker if you want, just enjoy the weirdness and then some mayo.

author: {'steamid': '76561198163474688', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 22, 'playtime_forever': 42, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 42, 'last_played': 1460209871}

author: {'steamid': '76561198053568113', 'num_games_owned': 4851, 'num_reviews': 351, 'playtime_forever': 331, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 331, 'last_played': 1460063553}
review:
I don't understand why this game has so much positive reviews. It's a clicking game, but a very, very bad one! All you have to do, is click on the same exact spot on the jar of mayo, every 100, 500, 1000 milestones, then, you unlock some achievements. You also have "stories" which are just 1 line of text with a different accessory that goes on the jar... You click like 50 times and then you pick another icon and keep going.

So I did that for 30 minutes and guess what? I've completed the game. Really what is the purpose of this game? It wasn't fun, it was extremely boring, short and repetitive!

If the game was free, sure! But it cost money... I truly 100% cannot recommend this game. It wasn't remotely fun.

author: {'steamid': '76561198093603927', 'num_games_owned': 2139, 'num_reviews': 115, 'playtime_forever': 21, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 21, 'last_played': 1460046284}
review:
It's a 'click this and get achievements game'
Unlock certain achievements, click with them 'active' and unlock the next bit. 

I have a Mad Catz MMO TE mouse, so I just programmed a macro to click for me, clicked about a hundred times (my mouse clicking a hundred more each time) and voila. easy.
Achievements earned, time wasted.

Not a 'game' as much as an artistic statement

author: {'steamid': '76561198014838758', 'num_games_owned': 1768, 'num_reviews': 70, 'playtime_forever': 230, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 30, 'last_played': 1481850988}
review:
My Name is Mayo.
Gra, w której musimy tak na prawdę, tylko klikać myszką (czy spacją) około 10000 razy przy przyjemnej melodii.
Gra, która pokazuje, że może to czas na inne (bardziej kreatywne) clickery.
Na początku wydaje się to brzemić banalnie, ale gdy zaczniemy czytać dziwne fakty i przygody naszych bohaterów ze świata Mayo, zobaczymy, że w tak banalnej, krótkiej i dziwnej grze może tkwić jakiś głębszy sens czy prawda.
Na prawdę, ten tytuł mnie mocno zaskoczył i lekko skłonił do pomyślenia. Chętnie bym zobaczył następną część tego clickera, tylko tym razem dłuższą i bardziej rozbudowaną.
Poza tym, gra może służyć jako kolejne łatwe osiągnięcia (a te robi się w około 30 min) lub jako kolejny numerek gry na profilu. 
Pomimo, że gra jest niestety krótka, pomysł jest świetny. Ode mnie 7/10

author: {'steamid': '76561198021959875', 'num_games_owned': 6844, 'num_reviews': 255, 'playtime_forever': 226, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 86, 'last_played': 1460457380}
review:
[h1]這是滑鼠左鍵點擊1萬次測試軟體[/h1]

故事分正經、不正經、把妹與夢想等，4條美奶滋內心戲，1條隨機小常識線，銀魂的土方說過：只要加了美奶滋，任何遊戲就會變的更好玩。

缺點是這程式還是用32bit來組譯，導致全球排行榜全部都是2,147,483,647。

author: {'steamid': '76561198032518991', 'num_games_owned': 591, 'num_reviews': 41, 'playtime_forever': 91, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 91, 'last_played': 1459861356}
review:
After getting addicted to Cookie Clicker for the 3rd time I figured I might as well go on a fully blown clicking rampage. It's one of the most honest games out there.  It is indeed just a touching story of a mayo.

I really liked the fact that the achievements serve some practical story-telling purpose, I'm always overjoyed when games do this.

Made the mistake of eating a mayo sadwich while playing it and now my throat feels like I've swallowed a can of oil.


"Open yourself to others...
Just as you opened this jar of Mayo!"

author: {'steamid': '76561197963717418', 'num_games_owned': 1842, 'num_reviews': 29, 'playtime_forever': 304, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 304, 'last_played': 1459775392}
review:
Machine à déstresser (ou pas), ce jeux propose purement et simplement de faire des clicks, en réfléchissant (ou pas) à autre chose, sur un pot de mayonnaise.... qui suivant le mode démarré permet de compléter 5 mini histoires très exitantes (ou pas). Plus on avance dans "l'histoire", plus il faut clicker pour avoir la suite de celle-ci et plus on avance dans l'histoire et plus on souhaite (ou pas) savoir la suite. Entre-temps vos clicks sont comptabilisés car évidemment il y a des "succès" et le dernier d'entre-eux est d'avoir cliqué 10000 fois et s'auto-satisfaire d'un but (ou pas) bien mérité (ou pas)... en tous cas tous ces clicks ne sont pas perdu puisque sans avoir fait cela vous auriez probablement (ou pas) fais plus ou moins les mêmes mouvements le pantalon sur les chevilles et sans souris (ou pas) bien que dans le jeux la mayonnaise ne s'éparpille jamais...En tous cas je suis soulagé de l'avoir terminé... En conclusion, ce plaisir ou un autre ne vous rendra pas plus intélligent (peu être légèrement plus musclé) sauf si vous avez pris le temps de réfléchir pour coder un programme qui click à votre place. Si comme moi vous êtes  convaincu du "Complètement inutile donc absolument indispensable", je vous recommandes fortement ce jeux. Sur ce, je vais diner et je vais certainement manger du Ketchup car la mayonnaise c'est plus gras et ca fait mal au poignet...

UP: plus joli en plus soft que le jeux "wha't is under your blanket?"

author: {'steamid': '76561198038476256', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 24, 'playtime_forever': 127, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 127, 'last_played': 1458639767}
review:
マヨネーズ瓶クリッカー。
ネタ以外の何者でもないｗ
ネタゲーをネタゲーとして笑い飛ばせない人には向かない。

はたしてゲームと言っていいのかも疑問だが
とにかくマヨ瓶をクリックするゲーム？

実績には、ただひたすらクリックして解除するものと
開始少し後で解除され、左上に出る一時停止のアイコンから行く
選択画面でストーリー付のアイコンを選択し、瓶に装備品(!?)をつけた上で
クリックして解除されるものがある。(何度か装備変えが必要)

クリックはスペースバーとマウスクリックの連携でスピードアップできる。

実績解除は30分前後だった。
(個人的に一番暇だったのが5000回から8000回クリックの時)
トレカ出す為に起動させてたのが2時間。

$1ネタゲーとしては有りかなwwwという程度。

author: {'steamid': '76561198116175145', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 48, 'playtime_forever': 359, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 347, 'last_played': 1459227258}
review: For a buck this game isnt bad. Yes you get the main idea of ALL the physical game play from the video above, but I think they made it clear that this was all youd be doing. The more you click the more you hear about random silly stories and they jar dresses up according to the part of each story you are cicking through. You pick a story as you unlock them and can read through according to color coded mini chapters concisting of a few sentances each. The more you click while dressing you jar within the lates chapter of a story, the closer you get to hearing the end of the silly short tail. It is a very short game, but entertaining for the bored achievment lover. Its a good gift for yourself if you are having trouble sleeping and are bored out of your mind ;)

author: {'steamid': '76561197996890045', 'num_games_owned': 3060, 'num_reviews': 293, 'playtime_forever': 61, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 59, 'last_played': 1528354765}
review:
My Name is Mayo is a clicker game.
There are no skills needed to play this "game" (I use the word "game" loosely here, because it is not what I would normally think of as a game).
All you need to do is to continuously click on a big picture of a jar of mayonnaise.

There are various achievements, all of which involve clicking on the big jar of mayo.
You need to activate most achievements by clicking on the relevant achievement icon, which will change the look of the mayo jar, and you then click away for the prescribed number of times.

I had heard that this "game" was all about clicking on a jar of mayo, but I felt sure that there had to be something more to it than that - well, I suppose the inclusion of some achievements gave it something more, but it certainly wasn't much more.

To finish all of the achievements for My Name is Mayo, all you have to do is click the right number of times on the right picture of the jar of mayo, and then do a few thousand more clicks. All up, it takes 10,000 clicks to finish.

The only reasons I could think of for playing this game are:
1) You intend to write a review of it. (I can tick that box).
2) You are really really really bored, with absolutely nothing else to do.
3) You want to get some Steam cards; either to sell, or for a new badge.
4) You are a "stat wh*re", wanting to raise your "Avg. Game Completion Rate" on Steam.
5) You are an odd person with a psychiatric problem (like some sort of masochistic disorder, or Munchausen syndrome) who wants to get RSI.

The odds are if you play this game too much, you will end up with a repetitive strain injury.

Unless you fall into one of the above 5 categories, don't buy My Name is Mayo - even if it is on special.
You have been warned!

author: {'steamid': '76561198124648739', 'num_games_owned': 1579, 'num_reviews': 188, 'playtime_forever': 185, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 37, 'last_played': 1486587218}
review:
First of all, this game is only good for the achievement hunters or obviously for game collectors.

In this clicking game it's your job to keep clicking on a useless yar with no way of making sense.
This game has close to zero content and is based on clicking constantly on one target.
Maybe you would wonder why i recommend this game, well it's amazingly easy to get all the achievements and farm a complete game, nice for achievement hunters like me.

However, this game is a good example of shitty products on Steam and everyone wonders how this game could have passed greenlight.
I bought it for 0,60 euro and that's not too bad for an easy 100% achievements game.

I won't make a line up of all good and bad things as it's very simple; this game has easy achievements and a bad gameplay, bad game design and lack of content.
I just appreciate it that they made the achievements so easy so that's why i upvote this game.
But we should understand all of us, that this should be a one time happening, if all shitty developers will make shitty games with easy achievements to attract achievement hunters than the value of getting an achievement will dramatically go down.

Thanks developers for this one time opportunity.
Over and out !

review:
Отличная игра за свои деньги! 
Огромный плюс в том что они действительно увлекает на 0.5-1 час игры!

review:
Ich habe in 55min 50 Erfolge, perfektes Spiel, mit 10.000 Clicks erreicht.
War mir das der Euro wert? JA!

"Mayo" ist nur etwas für folgende Leute:
- Clicker-Fans, die alles anklicken, was nicht bei Drei auf den Bäumen ist.
- Erfolgejäger, einfaches perfektes Spiel.
- Steam-Alles-Sammler, Sammler skuriller Spiele.
- 3/5 Sammelkarten gibt es sogar auch noch.

Das ist alles was das Spiel bietet und das ist in Ordnung.
Nur die Spielzeit ist sehr kurz, aber wer Clicker Heroes&Co spielt, dem ist es sowieso egal, ob da 1,2 oder 10 Stunden Spielzeit stehen.^^

author: {'steamid': '76561198028125071', 'num_games_owned': 11671, 'num_reviews': 74, 'playtime_forever': 227, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 38, 'last_played': 1466847187}
review:
You know how if you ever got super bored in class at school you'd type "1 + 1 =" and then keep pressing equals while watching the number increment?

This is a video game that replicates that, and they're charging money for it. There's no gameplay. There's no content. There is just a number that goes up when you click. And it doesn't even do that half the time - click too fast and it'll just stop working.

There are plenty of good, free incremental games on Steam and the internet at large. Play those instead.

EDIT: Oh, also of note - my 0.6 hours of gameplay? That's how long it took me to 100% complete this "game". This is not an incremental in the ilk of Cookie Clicker where there's any kind of ongoing gameplay. This is a single joke repeated 40 times for about a minute each and then the game is over with absolutely no replay value.

author: {'steamid': '76561198214220323', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 7, 'playtime_forever': 189, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 189, 'last_played': 1457284134}
review:
ну что сказать. купил игру за 29 рублей, это копейки, но что мы получаем за эту сумму? игра, в которой мы просто тычем по баночке! круто!! пройдемся по недостаткам: 
>прохождение игры буквально за пару часов(окончательно надоедает, таки да на удаление)
>жмешь esc - игра вылетает 
к плюсам:
>карты
>легчайшее получение всех 50 достижений
>простая миниигра

комментарий: так и не понял, как же делать скриншот... куда не жму, ровно ничего не происходит...

Мое решение, что на вылет игры при нажатии esc и короткий сюжет легко монжо закрыть глаза и за 29 рублей с радостью получить карты, 100% достижений, всеми любимые карточки и немного хорошего настроения. Берите и сами все пробуйте! Спасибо, что уделили время для прочтения этого обзора! Всем приятной игры!

author: {'steamid': '76561198097860849', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 21, 'playtime_forever': 221, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 130, 'last_played': 1457808902}
review:
According to the many negative reviews, I have to say: You know what you're buying.

You know it's a game, where you will be just clicking and clicking.
The game is very cheap, also you can't seriously expect something more or serious. But of course, compared to the rest of indie crap here it's overpriced.
The story is not heart-touching, it's actually kinda mess to see some point in it meanwhile you click between the achievements.

This game is more like designer's piece. If you like art of 50's and 60's, you will really like the graphic design.
The task is really simple and it's up to you how you will deal with it. If you wanna challenge yourself and set up a goal for a day with clicking or you will whine it's stupid game, where you are just clicking even if you knew it in advance.

I can pretty imagine this game as an advertising supporting game for some real mayo producer for free.

70/100

author: {'steamid': '76561197986360343', 'num_games_owned': 1568, 'num_reviews': 866, 'playtime_forever': 295, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 61, 'last_played': 1527540580}
review:
Two college roommates are about to go to bed. The guy in the top bunk has his girlfriend sleeping over. To try and keep quiet, they devise a code. His girlfriend will say "tomato" if she wants him to go slower and "lettuce" for him to go faster. As they begin to make love, the girl starts to moan, "Lettuce, lettuce, tomato, tomato!" The roommate on the bottom bunk wakes up the next morning and says, "Stop making sandwiches at night. You got mayonnaise in my eye!"

[u]Some interesting facts of mayonnaise:[/u]

--- As a sauce it wasn't used till the early 19th century. You wouldn't have guessed it, would you?
--- Its name originates from the French word moyeu which means egg yolk.
--- Mayo offers a very fast way to get fat - one tablespoon can contain almost 100 calories.
--- It does NOT have a short shelf life: various preservatives and acids are added so that it can be lengthened (contrary to popular beliefs).
--- Although some might find it difficult to believe, there are countries where mayo is preferred to ketchup. In the Netherlands, for instance.
--- Very good against sunburns! Eases the pain quickly and reduces the burning sensation (verified by myself).

Oh, about the game: get it if you want one more game with 100% achievement completion. It requires 10 thousand clicks (can be achieved in roughly an hour). As an extra challenge, don't use any autoclicker software. 'Nuff said!

author: {'steamid': '76561198102953733', 'num_games_owned': 246, 'num_reviews': 23, 'playtime_forever': 565, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 563, 'last_played': 1527214405}
review:
My Name is Mayo is a simple clicker game that can be addictive. It is a short game with really no purpose besides "learning the true meaning of mayo". Here are some of my pros and cons on the game.

My Pros:
Fun to idle/play around with the stories while you are tapping Mayo 
You can get all the achievements easily (got like 50% of them within 7 minutes)
Different "costumes/gamemodes" that are achievable after playing each story

My Cons:
The Price (It is $1. Luckily I got it for 40 cents in a sale)

Personally I like the game because I like simple indie/clicker games. If you don't like short games, you should DEFINITELY not  get this game, especially for the price. Overall, it is a good game, especially if you like getting an easy 100% game.

author: {'steamid': '76561198052264654', 'num_games_owned': 398, 'num_reviews': 16, 'playtime_forever': 57, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 57, 'last_played': 1456802697}

author: {'steamid': '76561198075780687', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 277, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 277, 'last_played': 1511472749}
review:
ШЕДЕВР! 10/10
Один из лучших кликеров: 

Плюсы: 
Во-первых - дизайн. Он великолепен. Цветовая гамма подобрана очень грамотно, создаётся ощущение какого-то уюта. 
Во-вторых - юмор и ирония. Этого здесь навалом. Но нужно знать английский.
В третьих - музыка. Приятная, лёгкая и в меру атмосферная. Само то для этой игры.
В четвёртых - коллекционные карточки. Без комментариев.
В пятых - ачивки. 50 шт. Тоже всё понятно.

Минусы:
Во-первых - нужно знать английский, хотя бы на уровне школьной программы.
Во-вторых - звук щелчков по банке не отключается в отличие от музыки. Это может некоторым быть не по нраву.

В целом игрулька проходиться за час с лихвой. Игра сделана с душой и это видно. Не знаю, почему но эта игра напомнила Little Inferno и на равне с ней отправляется в мой топ инди игр. В общем ВСЕМ СОВЕТУЮ! За такую скромную сумму - очень годный продукт!

 Спасибо!!

author: {'steamid': '76561198117080759', 'num_games_owned': 283, 'num_reviews': 7, 'playtime_forever': 123, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 123, 'last_played': 1455854409}
review:
[h1]Yes, you f#cking kidding[/h1]
My Name Is Mayo - что это за х#йня? Это довольно своеобразный кликер, где кликами мы будем не убивать монстров, а открывать банку с майонезом (Бред, на правда ли?). Дабы разнообразить геймплей, нам придется регулярно "переодевать" майонез в гитару, усы, леопардовые трусы, или же вовсе кликать по банке на фоне дождя из животных/дождя из де#ьма.
Для чего стоит брать ЭТО:
1. Изи ачивки (+изи "идеальная игра")
2. Карточки
3. Интересные факты
4. Фан
Оценю на 4/10, а также поздравляю ДиКаприо с получением Оскара)

author: {'steamid': '76561198112310701', 'num_games_owned': 566, 'num_reviews': 38, 'playtime_forever': 406, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 46, 'last_played': 1458629096}

author: {'steamid': '76561198087276266', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 32, 'playtime_forever': 112, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 112, 'last_played': 1456690809}
review:
Was soll ich sagen..... 

Ich habe grade fast eine Stunde lang und mehr als 10 000 Mal auf ein Glas Mayo geklickt, das immer wieder in absurden Kostümen auftaucht.  Dabei habe ich in sehr schneller Zeit 50 Erungenschaften freigeschaltet und immer wieder lustige Fun Facts gelesen.  So unfassbar dämlich dieses Spielprinzip klingt, so fühlt man sich Zwischenzeitlich auch. Lässt man sich aber darauf ein macht ist komischerweise irgendwie Spaß.

Ich habe definitiv schon 99 Cent für sinnlosere Sachen ausgegeben.

Ich würde eine Kaufempfehlung für alle ausprechen, die auf Achievement Jagd sind, ein perfektes Spiel in der Statistik haben wollen, oder einen lockeren Euro in der Tasche haben. 
My Name is Mayo bringt für wenig Geld eine Menge Beschäftigung.

Mit freundlichem Gruß

Meister Eder135

If you are an achievement hunter, this is your game.

author: {'steamid': '76561198014890588', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 48, 'playtime_forever': 63, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 30, 'last_played': 1456659414}
review:
It's not worth to call it a game. It's just clicking with left mouse button or SPACE on the mayonnaise the whole time...
without thinking, no tactic... nothing. The "music" doesn't change and the animations are really primitive. 
I guess every game which you can get for free is better and more meaningful. 

Just people who collect Steamachievements should buy this game. But just if they like to get achievements without a challenge.

Tip: For the people who want to make the 10.000 clicks - you are faster if you click space with the left hand and the mouse button with the right hand at the same time.

review:
Tarde cerca de 5 días investigando las palabras apropiadas para expresar o explicar lo mas similar posible lo que siento al ver este juego  y luego de un riguroso escrutinio e indagación llegué a la decisión inherente que por efecto debo declamar y afirmar que luego de lo antes mencionado en este párrafo es claro que llego a la conclusión de que no se que coño estoy diciendo.

author: {'steamid': '76561198150013276', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 393, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 44, 'last_played': 1566544396}

author: {'steamid': '76561198040779803', 'num_games_owned': 837, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 197, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 37, 'last_played': 1456760875}
review:
This game is a godsend. A masterpiece amongst the drivel that populates the gaming scene that is produced by giant mega greed corporations such as EA and Ubisoft. It brings to the table a story as strong as the Witcher 3, a tale of love as sad as Shakespeare's finest and tactical gameplay among the likes of CIV 5 and action like that of Counter Strike. 

I could not be more pleased with what has been given to me, and how riveted I was for the time it took me to play and complete this expansive world following the tale of solidarity this jar of mayonnaise follows. This should be immortalized in the halls of the Louvre for how revolutionary it is. 

I give this game a solid 10/10

I fuckin love mayo

author: {'steamid': '76561198053068913', 'num_games_owned': 339, 'num_reviews': 29, 'playtime_forever': 220, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 126, 'last_played': 1461981108}

全部の実績を解除して、2時間位でトレーディングカードも出しきった後がsteamランキングという闘いの場に移る訳だが……

とりあえず、スクリーンショットのお馬鹿さにピンと来たら買い。
ツクール系の量産型RPGを購入するよりは、有意義な時間を過ごせるさ。

review:
My Name is Mayo is a beautiful work of art of the gaming industry that includes very intense clicking gameplay and many different interesting stories.  I loved every second of this wonder.  The goal of the game is to take an adventure through the world of the condiment known as mayonnaise.  This jar of mayo and its stories are so life-changing that it might just make you haters of mayonnaise think twice, and put this substance onto your next meal.  

Truly a wonderful masterpiece.  10/10 would recommend

author: {'steamid': '76561198059769762', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 46, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 35, 'last_played': 1466246036}
review: Do you like to click for no reason at all?   Sure, you can read the storylines of this game, but who really cares?   Stripped down to its bare basics, it's about tapping a jar of mayo with your finger endlessly.  Forget end goals, there is only tapping.  You don't tap up, tap down, or tap out.  You merely become one with the tap. Clear your mind, your soul, your consciousness.  Become the finger, become the mayo, become the clink clink clink clink clink.  Even now, I realize typing this is useless and takes me away from tapping that jar of mayo.

author: {'steamid': '76561198262361794', 'num_games_owned': 270, 'num_reviews': 43, 'playtime_forever': 156, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 125, 'last_played': 1527533936}
review:
Довольно таки неплохая игра!
Очень крутое музыкальное сопровождение а так же спец. эффекты - супер!!!
Игра очень затягивает, она должна понравится всем, очень вспотел при прохождении этой замечательной игры.
А так же очень хотел какать еще с 3000 кликов, но затянуло до 15.000+ кликов, я получил наконец все достижения и убежал со спокойной душой какать.
Спасибо разработчикам за эту офигенную игрушку:)

Моя оценка игре:
10 кликов из 10.

author: {'steamid': '76561198006541362', 'num_games_owned': 2760, 'num_reviews': 237, 'playtime_forever': 53, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 53, 'last_played': 1455947541}
review:
Trying something new in the clicker game genre ins't easy, My Name is Mayo does so by giving you tiered achievements tied to a few different story bits or random fun facts and different "dresses" for your clickable jar of mayo.
Yet for all its trying the game doesn't stray too far from others and is, at most, a brief and forgettable distraction.

[b]PROS:[/b]

-the various story bits and random facts are somewhat interesting

-some of the mayo dressups are quite funny

[b]NEUTRAL:[/b]

-very easy to 100%

[b]CONS:[/b]

-once you're done with the story bits the last achievements require a few thousands dull clicks

-very short

-price tags on clicker games are always a bit of a gamble, and this one doesn't do much to justify it

http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=630962295

Just as you start having fun with My Name is Mayo the game is basically over as after about 4k clicks you'll have seen all the random facts, story bits and mayo types: the rest of the game will require you to click a few thousand more times with little to show for it and you might aswell just macro it. 

Even the funny bits are quite forgettable though and in fact the game doesn't do too much to stand out from other (and better) clicker games: it was gifted to me as a way to cheer up after a bad day (and it worked <3) and it is indeed a funny timewaster but it can't be considered much more.

Nothing really stands out enough for the game to justify even the very low price tag imho: sure there's some fun to be had and it's an easy 100% (if that matters to you) but it's overall too simple and forgettable to earn a recommendation.

author: {'steamid': '76561198005104575', 'num_games_owned': 567, 'num_reviews': 33, 'playtime_forever': 55, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 55, 'last_played': 1456229095}
review:
[b]2/10[/b] - Barely worth it, even on sale. Sorry!

You get an hour - at max - out of your dollar spend, which is good, but it comes with a lot of but's...
[b]1st... ,but[/b] it has no replayability at all. Once you're done there's no point in coming back.
[b]2nd... ,but[/b] it fails at being humorous, although it trys to be. Maybe it's just not my sense of humor, but this game barely manages to be funny in any way.
[b]3rd... ,but[/b] there is barely any gameplay. You just click about 15k times, and thats it - you beat the game. No upgrades, no stages, kinda no progression. No depth at at all. Its just very flat...

[b]4th... ,but[/b] it's kind of worth it, in case you're in for the achievments. Well it's a quick and easy 100%-game to add to your stats and the achievments are actually the interesting part of the game, since they are the only thing well designed in that game.

[b]Overall[/b] i can't recommend this game to anyone, who's not looking for an addition to their achievment stats. It just isn't a game at all. Its a demo at max.

author: {'steamid': '76561198110425795', 'num_games_owned': 13388, 'num_reviews': 10, 'playtime_forever': 267, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 267, 'last_played': 1456214410}
review:
정직한 스샷! 정직한 게임!

상점 페이지의 스샷을 감상하셨나요?
그럼 여러분은 이미 이 게임의 모든 것을 보셨다 해도 과언이 아닙니다.

스샷 만으로는 알 수 없는 다른 요소가 있는거 아니냐구요?
물론 있죠!
여러분의 초당 마우스 클릭 실력 향상을 위해 소중한 마우스와 손목을 혹사시켜 드립니다.
그리고 그 보답으로 도전과제 100% 를 선물로 받을 수 있습니다.

그래서 전 마우스 클릭 실력 향상 기회를 오토핫키에게 양보했습니다. 
이 자리를 빌어 소중한 제 마우스와 손목을 지켜주기 위해 노력해 준 오토핫키에게 감사의 인사를 전합니다.

저렴한(?) 가격으로 도전과제 100% 달성 숫자를 늘리고 싶으신 분들께만 추천합니다.
물론 할인 할때 사세요!!!

p.s.

Life is like a box of chocolates.

author: {'steamid': '76561198122662378', 'num_games_owned': 190, 'num_reviews': 31, 'playtime_forever': 94, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 94, 'last_played': 1689276810}
review: My Name is Mayo is a clicker game where you click on a jar of mayonnaise. It’s a silly idea for a game that should have stayed as an idea and not an actual product. There are a few gags in it but ultimately you’re paying for a waste of time. I don’t really have anything against My Name is Mayo but I can’t honestly recommend that someone pays money to play this. 5/10.

author: {'steamid': '76561198066984647', 'num_games_owned': 174, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 74, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 74, 'last_played': 1456394822}

author: {'steamid': '76561197997578873', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 85, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 85, 'last_played': 1456161162}
review:
A friend of mine bought me, and some of his other friends, this "game" just for the heck of it. 98% of my enjoyment in this game was listening to all of us (in a 3rd party voice chat server) shouting out every 5 seconds about which achievements we were getting.  The remaining 2% comes from the actual game itself.

This is one of those games that's essentially played by repeatedly clicking your mouse. That's it.  You don't have to move your mouse, aim your mouse, slide your mouse. You just click. A LOT.  How much?  Well, if you play it right and progress through the "story" and get all the achievements, you can finish the game in 10,000 clicks. Yeah, there's an achievement for clicking your mouse 10,000 times.  One would hope that this would be your second to last achievement. The final achievement is... Getting All The Achievements.

I think my friend bought me this game because he is studing to be a doctor with a specialization in Carpal Tunnel Syndrome.

author: {'steamid': '76561198024968498', 'num_games_owned': 10778, 'num_reviews': 116, 'playtime_forever': 96, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 30, 'last_played': 1458640809}
review:
A clicker game in a nutshell. Click, get achievements, click more and eventually that mayo jar will open. 50 achievements, trading cards, a few short stories, 10 000 clicks, trading cards and broken mouse button. Did I forgot to mention trading cards?

I have to admit that I clicked it  ~1500 times and then got bored and switched to my broken mouse which registers much more clicks than I actually do.

What am I doing with my life?
Mayo/10

author: {'steamid': '76561198001774632', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 15, 'playtime_forever': 109, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 98, 'last_played': 1527523339}
review:
In this game you click a jar of mayo a lot of times and on the way you earn achievements and watch the jar of mayo in a few different outfits and scenarios.

The game itself isn't very technically impressive. But I guess you could say that about a lot of games nowadays.

Sure, you could have a little bit of fun with this as a meme thing, but as a game it's not something I'd recommend to anyone.

author: {'steamid': '76561198151140405', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 80, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 80, 'last_played': 1456150126}
review:
10/10
отличная игра за сущие копейки
включает в себя забавные ачивки, интересные факты, несколько вариантов бикини и душещипательную историю отношений
НО
можно заметить что в ирл открыть крышку банки с майонезом постукиванием не так просто
так что держите несколько методов того, как открыть банку более легким способом:
1) Зажмите бутылку антистатической салфеткой. Зажим поможет открыть бутылку
2) Возьмите чайную ложку и засуньте ее кончик под край банки.Давите ложкой так, чтобы округлая часть ложки находилась напротив банки. Вы услышите щелчок, который означает, что банка открылась.
3) Используйте кончик ножа для масла и загоните его в пространство между крышкой и банкой.
Продолжайте прикладывать силу, как если бы это был рычаг, продвигая нож вдоль всей крышки.
4) Держа банку под наклоном в 45 градусов к горизонту, ударяйте стороной крышки о твердую поверхность. Например, делайте это на полу, повторяя это движение по всей окружности банки.Если это не помогает, попробуйте использовать заднюю часть кухонного ножа, ударяя им об угол металлической банки.Еще один способ применить этот метод – перевернуть банку и ударить крышкой о твердую поверхность. Нужно будет проделать это только один или два раза.

author: {'steamid': '76561198161675519', 'num_games_owned': 89, 'num_reviews': 18, 'playtime_forever': 168, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 104, 'last_played': 1457109698}
review: My Name is Mayo – это по-настоящему необычная игра, которая дарит игроку уникальный опыт. Понравится ли вам этот опыт? А черт его знает. Я до сих пор не определился, была ли эта игра тратой времени или нет. Но, надо признать, в определенный момент она подарила мне некоторое удовольствие и заставила, как минимум, улыбнуться. Именно поэтому моя оценка даже не нейтральная, а положительная. Если вы любите странные и необычные игры, то эта игра для вас.

author: {'steamid': '76561197977670326', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 7, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 7, 'last_played': 1456132679}
review:
They say that gameplay is more than story. Not for this game. This is a marathon. This is about endurance. This is about knowing that your name is Mayo and that you need to know that Mayo is who you truly are deep down.

White.
Easily moved.
You can relate to anything.
You make up your own story.

author: {'steamid': '76561198064749428', 'num_games_owned': 156, 'num_reviews': 24, 'playtime_forever': 18, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 18, 'last_played': 1456129484}
review:
What do we do now?
Have you ever been stuck in life, feeling scared to do anything because you're afraid of failing? And when you know you have to do something but instead of doing something, you keep asking yourself "What do I do now?".

Well first of all, you should feel scared of failing, failing is scary and it's devastating. But that's normal, everyone feels like that. 
Secondly, you shouldn't keep problems to yourself, it's just like math, more people you share it with the less hard it will be. 

Sharing success with others is easy, but sharing failure and asking for a hand is not so easy. You probably feel uncomfortable showing negative emotions to others, most people keeps them to themselves and only try to show the positive part. I mean why would you burden someone with your problems? But sometimes a problem is too much to handle by yourself and when you are faced with that kind of a problem, talk to someone. And when you see someone with that kind of a problem, don't step away from it. Even if you're uncomfortable, go talk to them.

Now you know what to do when faced with a problem, but how do you start? Well "My Name is Mayo" is a game that explores the habit of hiding one's self to others. And hopefully this game will encourage you to be more open about yourself.

"My Name is Mayo" -just like it's strange title- is kind of a strange game. You start with an ordinary jar of mayonnaise, and as you progress through the game you will unlock stories of the ordinary jar of mayonnaise. 
At first glance, these stories seems like nothing but a joke, at first glance this whole game looks like nothing but a joke.
But after completing the first playthrough and you take a second look into each story, you will see that this game is far from just a joke.
There are four stories of [url=http://i.imgur.com/WoP2L8S.jpg]Mayo[/url], four very different kind of stories(which I wouldn't go into much detail about, because unlocking the next part of each story is something you should experience for yourselves). All four stories deal with the same idea, that we should be more open to others. Whether it's in a relationship, with your parents or with your friends, you should always feel comfortable sharing. 
As seen in each story, not being open to others have consenquences. You might break up, you might get into fights or you might lose someone important to you. 

So why keep a problem to yourself? You gain nothing from it, and you won't lose anything from sharing it. After you played through this game you'll know, whenever you ask yourself the question "What do I do now?" just open yourself to others, open a jar of mayonnaise.

author: {'steamid': '76561198056274794', 'num_games_owned': 159, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 23, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 22, 'last_played': 1470714365}
review: This is an amazing game, truly outrageous if i do say so myself. This game is an exciting sci-fi action horror rpg moba cross-over that made me cry everytime i played. If you decide to buy this game, whether it be for you or a friend, you won't end up regretting your purchase. This amazing game includes multiple choice influenced plots and over 950 hours of jaw-dropping, edge-of-the-sit, heart-warming gameplay. This game includes never before seen game mechanics that just tie so well with the theme of the game that it just makes you keep coming back for more. After the first time i played this game i had to un-install because my motor skills weren't mechanically ready for the expert level challenges that is My Name is Mayo. It took me 72 hours of non-stop training to comeback and feel like i was up to par with this game. I would rate this game 9/10 because of the the voice acting, but don't let the voice acting keep you from playing this game because the awe-inspiring graphics make up for them.

author: {'steamid': '76561198053208728', 'num_games_owned': 873, 'num_reviews': 57, 'playtime_forever': 57, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 37, 'last_played': 1481617762}
review:
I didn't expect anything from this game; it had memes in the tags and its a clicker about... mayonaise. Seemed like Pewdiepiebait when I first saw it.

But I would say this game is definitely worth a dollar or sixty five cents on sale. I thought this game was really charming with it's odd little story. The gameplay is essentially just "mash left mouse and space bar until you damage your tendons", but there area several little chunks of story that you unlock as you click along.

It's a fun, quirky little game that I had a good time with

author: {'steamid': '76561198027598400', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 46, 'playtime_forever': 16, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 11, 'last_played': 1562738408}
review:
This game is a prime example of what a great year 2016 will be for the Video Game Industry. My Name is Mayo brings a revolutionary game to the table, a game that immerses the player into the life of your not so average mayo jar. My Name is Mayo tells a touching story, a story that rivals the epics of Homer, it is deep, emotional, heartwarming, and a puts a genuine smile on your face. Now the gameplay of My Name is Mayo is where this game shines. You see by either hitting the space bar or by clicking on the jar, you progress in the game. You see what is great about this is that the game has no time limit, or speed at which it must be played. You are in control, you drive the bus here, YOU the player get to expeience this adventure by your rules! Now if this isn't convincing enough for you did I mention that this game has a beautiful soundtrack? The music in this game surpasses any great symphony or musical piece ever written. It puts Motzart to shame, Bach can't even begin to comprehend how amazing this musical masterpiece is. Now if you aren't convinced of this game's amazing value by now then frankly you shouldn't even be allowed to use a computer anymore, because obviously you can't comprehend how amazing this game is, but if you still aren't convinced then let me tell you one last thing to change your mind. This game has achievements! Yes! Achievements! And these achievements not only make you feel really good, but you can show them off to your friends too! Trust me, Billy down the street won't be the cool kid anymore once you stroll in with your big list of achievements, not only that you can whip out that handy dandy smartphone or laptop of yours and show everybody that you're on the top of those world leaderboards for number of clicks. So you may ask, "Wow this game is amazing, there's got to be some catch" or "There's got to be one bad thing about this game right?" NOPE! My Name is Mayo is flawless, utter coding perfection. I mean come on, Fallout 4 on release had so many bugs the damn game was unplayable, but My Name is Mayo? Nope, no bugs here, 100% bug free since launch day. And the graphics? Well, My Name is Mayo takes complete advantage of your PC's advanced and powerful processors and video cards, it has zero restrictions whatsoever. No capping at 30fps to fit those console peasants, My Name is Mayo is 100% PC Master Race compatable. My Name is Mayo will change your life, are you single? Show a girl (or a boy) your high score and we'll see how "single" you are then. Failing math class at school? Play this and you'll learn advanced math with no problems. Are you overweight and want to drop a few pounds? Play this and your constant clicking will burn through that fat in no time. And best of all, you get this masterpice of a game for only $0.99! I'm telling you people, once we make contact with alien life, this is the game we'll show them to prove how advanced we are. NASA uses this game to help train their astronauts, seriously, it's that good! Tai Lopez himself uses this game, without this game he would have no knowledge, and with no knowledge there would be no garage, and with no garage there would be no fuel units, and then where would we be? My Name is Mayo GIVE YOU KNOWLEDGE. KNOWLEDGE.
So what are you waiting for? Don't stare at your computer screen like a moron, Buy this game now!

author: {'steamid': '76561197994682977', 'num_games_owned': 849, 'num_reviews': 18, 'playtime_forever': 41, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 28, 'last_played': 1576278716}
review:
As a fan of clickers, I guess I was expecting something more. The entire game depends on "Lol SO Randomz" humour. While initially amusing, a few hundred clicks in it's already worn thin. 

47 of the 50 achievements are accomplished in about 5000 clicks. The remaining 3 are "Get 8000 clicks" "Get 10k clicks" and "Get all achievements." That's double the game's length in padding. 

Not many games can I say I paid $0.60 for and still feel if the expediture was questionable.

author: {'steamid': '76561198059334708', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 45, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 45, 'last_played': 1456033594}
review:
My Name is Mayo isn't great.


I didn't expect much from this game, but for less than a dollar (when 40% off), I bought it hoping for an interesting game with a fairly good story. Unfortunately all I got was half of an interesting game without a good story. The game did make me laugh at some points with it's strange visuals, but the good story I was hoping for? Nothing. All I got was a silly, forgetable bunch of nonsensical stories that didn't intrest me in any way. I think the reason why I feel this way is because I couldn't connect with the character.


In a game about clicking a jar of mayonaise, I found it difficult to conect to the main character, Mayo.


It may sound strange, but have you ever played a story game for the gameplay? I'm sure about 85% of you will say no, you play a story game for the interesting and memorable characters, for the detailed plot. A plot about a horny, philosophical jar of mayo? No. A plot about a criminal named Larson Hoover who discovers he has lung cancer, so he spends the his last 8 months trying to right his wrongs and reconnect with his family? Yes. That's what My Name is Mayo was lacking, a good story.  Does Mayo have a family? Does Mayo have an occupation? Does Mayo have a secret? Nah, he/she/it's just an admirer of bikinis and a nut for philosophy.


So that's my thoughts of My Name is Mayo as a story game. what about as a clicker game?


Awful is the only way to describe it. It adds nothing new to the clicker games. I fact, It took away the only few things that made the clicker games good. All you do in My Name is Mayo is click a jar of mayonaise, and that's it. There are no upgrades, no temporary power-ups, and nothing changes. A good example is Cookie Clicker. For those of you that have played the game, you have probably discovered the "grandma incident". I remember when I got to that moment, all I could say is, "Holy ####, what the #### is going on!?" In My Name is Mayo, nothing like that happens. You just click away and get frequent hand cramps with no changes in gameplay whatsoever. It's boring.


So after ######## about all the bad things, because I'm a glass half empty kind of guy, lets talk about some of the good things My Name is Mayo has to offer.


The game isn't so bad that I want to lock myself in a glass box in front of a kindergarteners and suffocate to death. The visuals and story gave me a small chuckle every now and then and the random facts were fun to read. And I rememer marveling at the amount of time people put into this game to get on top of the mayo clicking leaderboard. That was fun. And... um............ yeah, don't buy this game. Get a gumball with your dollar or something. This game will leave you feeling robbed and unsatisfied.

author: {'steamid': '76561198042798748', 'num_games_owned': 84, 'num_reviews': 17, 'playtime_forever': 204, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 204, 'last_played': 1456030738}
review:
For less than a dollar, I wouldn't even mind paying this for that amount of price.

[h1]The Basics?[/h1]
Well, it's nothing more than a clicking clicker adventure, except more entertaining with 50 easy achievements that provides you a random fact or you can have 4 different stories being told.

[h1]Basic summaries from the four stories:[/h1]
[olist]
    [*]Love/Sex Story
    [*]What's Life? Story
    [*]Relationship between a Mayo and someone Story (It's rather depressing...)
    [*]Dreaming Career Story
[/olist]

As you progress with the stories and achievements, the Mayo Jar will change outfits depending on the story that's being told. (*Ahem* emphasis on the Love/Sex Story)

Depending your pace, it may take you less than an hour or two or maybe even more when trying to get the card drops. Honestly, even without an autoclicker, it shouldn't take you [b]that[/b] long.

[h1]But once you get all the achievements, what else is there to do?[/h1]
You can keep going, clicking on your merry way, replay the stories, but there really isn't much to it afterwards.

In conclusion, it's an enjoyable experience. The entertaining stories make up the small price.
[spoiler]Oh, and you might get a mayo fetish after clicking it so many times for so long. ;)[/spoiler]

[i]What do we do now?
(The End)[/i]

[h1]Should you buy this "clicker of a game?"[/h1]
Honestly, it's your choice. Are you willing to pay about a dollar for a decent clicking experience? Want more trading cards for badge crafting? Then this is for you.
7.5/10

author: {'steamid': '76561198168154283', 'num_games_owned': 64, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 101, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 88, 'last_played': 1456020653}
review:
先问几个问题。开发商能把手臂做上不？你们连续点击20分钟是什么感觉？你们最高连着点了多久？为什么点了一会儿瓶子光环就不在了，是不是点的太慢了？为什么空格点击和触摸板点击一个用手指，一个不用？bug？
好，那么，作为一个中医学生来说，我的手指力量和前臂肌得到了非常好的训练，为针灸铺垫了基础。作为一个我刚玩我妹就说要把瓶盖点开以及点完感觉空格键都不是我的了的游戏。我觉得很荣幸地看着瓶盖儿在瓶体上来回磨蹭，希望的成就一个一个地完成◑▂◑          
最后，游戏是我和我妹一起完的，我妹在我玩到30分钟的时候来问我，瓶盖儿撬开了吗？2333，给我点了5000下后，她就在电脑旁边抓狂了！

author: {'steamid': '76561198112866114', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 330, 'playtime_forever': 76, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 76, 'last_played': 1568892293}
review:
The whole objective of this game is to click on a mayo jar 10,000 times. Seriously that's it. There is nothing else to do other than that. Click the same spot 10,000 times on a completely stationary mayo jar. What happens at the end once you have clicked on the mayo jar 10,000 times? The lid comes off and a title says 'open yourself to others just like you have opened this mayo jar'... What the hell does that mean? Does the developer want me to go around touching people 10,000 times? 

If at the end of the game the title would have been the developers address so that I could drive myself around to his house and hit him over his noggin with a police baton 10,000 times I might have given this game a thumbs up, but alas it doesn't. I hit the thumbs down button for this one 10,000 times and maybe even the middle finger button which steam hasn't added yet...

Sample below from Jim Sterling...

https://youtu.be/_OoXfp9cUdU

If you enjoyed reading this review please subscribe to my curator page. Thanks...

http://store.steampowered.com/curator/6843548/

author: {'steamid': '76561197963550511', 'num_games_owned': 26600, 'num_reviews': 272, 'playtime_forever': 102, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 71, 'last_played': 1469399171}
review:
For a bunch of cents and some optional carpal tunnel injuries, you can +1 your 100%'d Steam games while reading through a mildly entertaining story. By removing nonlinear progression system and resets, the clicker genre is streamlined down to the simple act of clicking. Depending on how jolly your hands are, this will take an hour of actual clicking, or two if you're a slowpoke. For about half the clicks you're treated to the game's writing and frequent fresh & reasonably novel mayonnaise targets.

My wrist started moaning after the first 2000 clicks; the next 3000 to the end of the story content I alternated between carpal exercises and further clicking. For the last grind, I turned on autoclicking software and walked off.

author: {'steamid': '76561198081430111', 'num_games_owned': 2542, 'num_reviews': 109, 'playtime_forever': 48, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 48, 'last_played': 1455930807}
review:
I just beat this game in it's entirety in the last half hour. My finger hurts, but I don't regret it. My Name is Mayo is a completionist's wet dream, but it's also decently entertaining.

.Premise.
This game is about a jar of mayo, as you're likely aware. The "story" is presented in a series of unlockable achievements, both in game and out, and there are a handful of different ones to click through. Fulfilling the clicking requirements for one 

.Game play.
Click. Click for your life. You can cycle through the achievements in order to get more achievements, which also result in a Mayo costume change. Then you click some more. Both the costumes and the story itself are funny for their shock value and off the wall...ness. 

.Soundtrack.
Eh... I didn't pay too much attention to it over the 'clink, clink' of tapping against a simulated glass jar.

.Graphics.
It kind of looks hand-painted, which is nice. And a few of the props actually moved around. 

.Price.
For a game with absolutely no longevity, I'd say I can't complain about the $0.59 price tag at launch. 1.00USD is a little steep, but that's up to you.

Bottom line: it's amusing and clever and I'd love to see a less casual game from the developers. Definitely worth a look if you have some time to kill. When else are you going to see Mayo in such a sexy state?

My only complaint is that I ran out of funny story achievements and costume changes at around 5000 clicks, which left a solid 5000 clicks for completion without any added silliness.

author: {'steamid': '76561198048842929', 'num_games_owned': 2402, 'num_reviews': 463, 'playtime_forever': 240, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 183, 'last_played': 1456081150}
review:
Bei der Installationsangabe wurden 17 MB angezeigt, aber nur 11,9 MB wurden runtergeladen.

Also auch Leute die im Wald leben und kein DSL, ja noch nicht mal ISDN haben, falls es sowas noch geben sollte, könnten sich das Game runterladen.

Jetzt zum eigentlichen Game! Viele schreiben, dass man hier nur etwas rumklicken muss und dann einen Haufen Errungenschaften und ein perfektes Game bekommt. Aber stimmt das wirklich? Wir werden sehen.

Sehr ausführliche Gamebeschreibung: Man startet das Game und sieht ein Mayoglas, mit einem Rotem Decken. Man steuert eine Hand und wenn man auf das Majoglas klickt, dann wird das gezählt und in der rechten oberen Ecke festgehalten. Bei bestimmten Punktzahlen bekommt man eine Errungenschaft. Wenn man das Game beendet und irgendwann wieder startet, dann spielt man da wo man aufgehört hatte weiter, also Punktzahlenmäßig. Und es gibt noch eine globale Bestenliste, von der ich nichts halte, da alles erschwindelt aussieht.  Das wars. Das ist das ganze Game. Ich glaube ausführlicher kann man es nicht beschreiben^^

Ich vermute ein Mensch hat das Game an einem Wochenende im Alleingang entwickelt. Wenn er mit Steam einen guten Deal gemacht hat, ist er vielleicht jetzt ein Millionär. Auch wenn das Game regulär 99 Cent und im Sale noch weniger einbringt! Denn hier zählt die Masse der Käufe, die von errungenschaftsgeilen „Gamern“ erbracht wurde.

Persönliche Erfahrung:
Für mich selber war es nicht so leicht die ganzen Errungenschaften zu bekommen. Dieses Bild mit dem Majoglas brannte sich in meine Augen. Tränen liefen, ich hatte das Bedürfnis mir meine Augen auszustechen. Dieses eintönige Lied! Das werde ich nie mehr vergessen! Jeden Moment hätte mein Trommelfell platzen können. Ich brenne, Obdachlose versuchen mich zu löschen, indem sie auf mich pissen! Ich rollte mich zur Seite um zu sterben. Ich wache nassgeschwitzt auf, danke Gott den Allmächtigen unseren Schöpfer, dass es nur ein Albtraum war. Nichtsdestotrotz hatte ich den Wunsch jeden zu töten, der eine majofarbene Bekleidung mit einer roten Mütze an hatte.

PS: Es gibt auch Sammelkarten

Wenn Euch das Review gefallen hatte, dann bedankt Euch bei R4LL3, denn durch seine Review bin ich zu diesem Game gekommen. Wenn ihr ihn noch nicht kennt, sein Profilbild sieht aus als wenn er kurz davor stehen würde euch das Gesicht zu zerschlagen. Ich weiß, Profilbilder sagen nichts über die tatsächliche Person aus! Vielleicht ist er auch ein kleines folgsames Mädchen, eine kleine Prinzessin mit Zahnspange. Er könnte aber auch ein knallharter Hardcoretyp sein. Zollt ihm also Respekt!

Diese Review wurde nach fünf Bier verfasst. Rechtschreibfehler sind möglich, sogar wahrscheinlich. Das schreibe ich nur, weil ich keine Lust habe mir den Wisch nochmal durchzulesen. OK ich bin auch wirklich etwas besoffen :D

author: {'steamid': '76561198078519628', 'num_games_owned': 1567, 'num_reviews': 169, 'playtime_forever': 43, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 43, 'last_played': 1455922389}
review:
So....This is a game....Where you click a jar of mayo. It's all you do. You ocassionally unlock new "outfits" for your jar of mayo. (I dare to say, some of them are sexy. What am I doing with my life?)
It's one of those clicker games, but this one is as cynical as it gets. 

It's all there's to it. If you want an "easy" perfect game (It's easy to get all the achievements, but it's quite tedious. You need to click around 10,000. I wouldn't waste my precious mouse with this, so I used scripts.)

Click click click, unlock new outfits, keep clicking, and sooner or later, you'll get a perfect game and you can finally get rid of this game forever. I wouldn't recommend it at all, I went through it with scripts and I still feel like killing myself. You  could gift this to somebody if you want them to question life and hate themselves.

author: {'steamid': '76561198006298956', 'num_games_owned': 1118, 'num_reviews': 16, 'playtime_forever': 134, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 26, 'last_played': 1457112108}
review:
You are a hand, floating in an unknown void. The stars align and your path crosses with that of Mayo. Mayo will enthrall you with tales of its life, it will make you think with philosphy, it will try to arouse your most carnal instincts. 

Nah, I'm just screwing with you. You just tap on a mayo jar. Sometimes you can put silly things on it, like bikinis. There are puns. That's about it. 

What you have to ask yourself is: Do you like clicking on condiments more than you like dropping 59 pennies and deciding not to waste the effort to bend down and pick them up? I recommend it because I'm bad with money.

review:
마요네즈의 뚜껑이 열리고 내용물을 쏟기 전까지,
주마등처럼 스쳐가는 마요네즈의 지난 삶을 회상하는 게임이다.
고통없이 한번에 돌려 열 수도 있지만,
손가락으로 만번을 두드려 마요네즈의 뚜껑을 여는 것은 다소 잔학하기까지 하다.
마요네즈 뿐만이 아니라 식탁에 올라오는 식재료에 대해
조금은 다른 시선으로 의인화하여, 바라보고 생각할 수 있는 기회를 제공하는 게임이다.

author: {'steamid': '76561198120159915', 'num_games_owned': 484, 'num_reviews': 51, 'playtime_forever': 109, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 101, 'last_played': 1513863210}
review:

author: {'steamid': '76561198116240113', 'num_games_owned': 577, 'num_reviews': 55, 'playtime_forever': 45, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 32, 'last_played': 1556893705}
review:
クリックゲー。
マヨネーズがどうやっても開かないからつっついてみる。開かない。
ビキニを着せてつっつく。開かない。
帽子をかぶらせてつっつく。開かない。
人生について考えながらつっつく。開かない。

いろいろ思いを巡らせながら１００００回つっついたとき、何かが起きます。

☆簡単な流れ☆
最初つっつきだすとやたら実績解除され、左上の一時停止みたいなマークをクリックすると解除された実績の確認が可能。
解除された実績のなかで（story）と書いてある実績を選択して再度つっついていくとそのストーリーが進行していく。(進行ごとに実績の付け替えを忘れずに！)
すべてのstoryをクリアした後、１００００回つっつけばクリア。

スペースキーもクリック判定があるので、両手でスペース連打＆クリック連打することで効率的？につっつける。

外部マクロ使えるみたいですが、１００００回過ぎてからにしてほしい。このゲームの楽しさを9割削ると思う。

storyごとに多彩な表情を見せるマヨ。妙に中毒性のある音楽。
最初は音楽に合わせて～とかで軽快にクリックするあなたも１０００回越えたあたりから死んだ魚のような目で連打すること間違いなし！
実績フルコンプしたら、フレにでも送りつけてやりましょう。

author: {'steamid': '76561198115158556', 'num_games_owned': 1402, 'num_reviews': 392, 'playtime_forever': 208, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 208, 'last_played': 1455858937}
review:
5.9/10 - If you didn't know... Clicking 10,000 times takes about an hour!

I didn't know what to expect with this game; it's my kind of dumb though! This is basically just a fun clicking competition between friends. I love seeing the number of clicks from my friends; I'm currently sitting #2 with 12,200 clicks and will surpass them all. Maybe…

This is one of the easiest games to complete with 100% achievements. Worth the $0.99 if you are searching for those; otherwise only play if you are into clicking competitions. 

Worth $0.59-0.99 for achievements and a wrist workout!

author: {'steamid': '76561198043282874', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 15, 'playtime_forever': 96, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 96, 'last_played': 1455841756}
review:
"Mein Arm tut weh, aber das wars wert! Noch nie war ein Glas Mayonnaise so interessant." DerGrueneShawn 2016 ~

Story:
Ein Glas Mayonnaise auf seinem steinigen Weg, seine wahre Identität zu finden. Lustig, herzzerreisend und renomierte Bollywoodregisseure arbeiten grade schon auf Hochtouren an einem Drehbuch.

Gameplay.
KLICK KLICK KLICK KLICK KLICK KLICK KLICK KLICK KLICK KLICK KLICK KLICK KLICK KLICK KLICK KLICK KLICK KLICK KLICK KLICK KLICK KLICK KLICK KLICK KLICK KLICK KLICK KLICK KLICK KLICK KLICK KLICK KLICK KLICK KLICK KLICK

Präsentation:
Ein Glas Mayonnaise, eine Hand, viele skurrile Situationen und Errungenschaften, was will man mehr?

Fazit: 
Ich habe in 36 Minuten 10000 mal geklickt, gelacht, geweint, okay nicht geweint, aber zumindest ein bisschen gelitten, vor allem, weil das echt auf die Arme geht, wenn man nicht schummelt und WIRKLICH nur klickt und habe das Spiel somit schneller beendet, als dass alle 3 Kartenfunde ausgelöst wurden. Ein kurzweiliges Erlebnis, das einige Kalorien verbrennt und in keiner Küche ... Steambibliothek fehlen sollte ~

review: Это однозначный прорыв в индустрии развлечений. Симулятор козла, симулятор хлебушка, и вот он, долгожданный симулятор майонеза (у которого проблемы с самоидентификацией). Что здесь можно сказать? У меня игровая мышь с кнопкой триплклика. Там, где прочие были вынуждены клацать десять тысяч раз, я отделался лёгким испугом и кликнул всего 3334. Читал книгу и параллельно вяленько кликал. Думаю, за этим жанром будущее.

author: {'steamid': '76561198037002672', 'num_games_owned': 1137, 'num_reviews': 274, 'playtime_forever': 211, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 57, 'last_played': 1456196177}
review:
[h1] Сломай палец и мышку тысячами кликов! [/h1]

Игра представляет собой кликер, правда не совсем обычный, ибо придётся [strike] всю игру [/strike] тыкать пальцем в банку майонеза! Ну, прям очень увлекательно, правда. 

Также в игре предоставлены различные скины. Суть такова - когда открывается новый скин, нужно выбрать его и кликать определенное кол-во раз пока не откроется другой скин, снова сменить скин и так до победного 50-го достижения...

Лично я прокликал 19140 раз, открыв все достижения. Кстати, очень пригодилась кнопка тройного клика на мышке x7.

Есть даже таблица лидеров, я занимаю 545 место. Правда, я более чем уверен, что первые места занимают игроки использующие автокликеры и т.п. 
Вот к примеру, у первых 16 игроков в топе результат - 2147483647, по-видимому это максимальный счёт игры. 

[h1] Для большего погружения нужно срочно добавить скин ведёрка майонеза "Янта Провансаль"! [/h1]

P.S. - Порадовал скин банки с леопардовым нижним бельём. Просто, как бы сказать, у моей девушки есть в точности такой же лифчик. Сделал скрин, позже покажу ей. :D

author: {'steamid': '76561198284031988', 'num_games_owned': 346, 'num_reviews': 37, 'playtime_forever': 50, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 49, 'last_played': 1558846162}
review:
[h1]最前面的前面[/h1]
时隔接近一年半，我回来把这个游戏改成了不推荐
很简单，作为一款游戏，它实在是太无聊了
根本就不能算作是一款游戏
这种游戏不会给人带来任何东西
连挫败感都带不来
你可以把它当做屏保用，但它绝不是一款游戏

一年前的我还是too young啊
------------------------------分割线------------------------------
[h1]写在最前面[/h1]
[b]别看这款游戏定价只有六元钱[strike]打折的时候只有三元钱[spoiler]从两瓶饮料钱变成一瓶了，可以边喝饮料边玩了[/spoiler][/strike][/b]
[b]你还有可能再付出几十至几千不等的[spoiler]鼠标[/spoiler]钱[/b]
珍爱金钱，远离Mayo
但我还是点了推荐此游戏啊（笑

这可真是一款让我哭笑不得的游戏QvQ
让我们来数一下这款游戏的作用
[olist]
[*]练手速，抑或是与舍友拼手速
[*]在游戏的同时验证鼠标的真正点击寿命
[*]可以买个更好的鼠标了
[*]欣赏哭笑不得的故事
[/olist]
没错，这款游戏居然有主线，还是同时进行的四个主线任务！[strike]虽然都是在点击鼠标罢了[/strike]
在不同的剧情下你能看到Mayo的不同发展史，我相信懂点英语的人都能看懂←_←
然后就没了
什么？你问我最后？
你买了这个矫情的Mayo罐头不就是为了打开吃么，那你干啥只点它不扭开啊QvQ[strike]我想吐槽好久了[/strike]

最后，强烈推荐这款游戏的一个外挂——按键精灵OvO

最后的最后
如果你喜欢一个人，就和TA一起看Mayo的故事
如果你恨一个人，就让他一个人玩Mayo[strike]还不让他用按键精灵[/strike]

最后的最后的最后
没了

最后的最后的最后的最后
对，这款游戏的BGM还挺小清新的，点击声也很清脆
[spoiler]没错，屏幕上那只手就是你在拿鼠标的那只手[/spoiler]

最后的最后的最后的最后的最后
[strike]舰队的舰队的舰队的舰队的重巡[/strike][spoiler]没错我只是想玩梗而已2333[/spoiler]

author: {'steamid': '76561198054490655', 'num_games_owned': 159, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 76, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 74, 'last_played': 1527933368}
review:
どこか心落ち着かせるBGM、瓶をクリックするたびにからんと響くさわやかな音。

これだけでもこのゲームを買う理由となりうるが、このゲームの最大の売りは実績として開放されるストーリーにある。
ジュース1本買うお金をマヨネーズの瓶に使うだけで、精神を落ち着かせる瓶叩きのみならず、馬鹿げた英文ショートショートを読むことができるのだ。
その馬鹿馬鹿しさは疲れた心も癒やし、貴方を次なるステージへと導くだろう。

時間を潰したい人、最近心に余裕が無いと感じる人には特におすすめできる作品といえる。

author: {'steamid': '76561197983082568', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 100, 'playtime_forever': 263, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 261, 'last_played': 1490055000}
review:
My Name is Mayo
Score: 7.5 / 10

Instructions: 
1. Pick a story Arc
2. Stick your finger on the Mayonnaise Jar
3. Auto click until the Achievement appears
4. If Total Achievements = 50 then End
5. Otherwise goto 1.

This was fun for just 1 hour and 10 000 ‘clicks’. Upbeat music in that 1950s cartoon orchestral style accompanies a Jar of Mayonnaise in 4 coming of age stories. 

The novelty factor has worn off and I am not certain that I would buy another ‘clicker’ game. Did someone say this should have been free?

secret music hack: 
If you go into your \steamapps\common\My name is Mayo\ windows\
Find the file called snd_main.ogg and replace the file with any music file you have in .ogg format. 
You have to rename your music file to snd_main.ogg! 
Then boot the game and you can click away to your favorite song !

Buy "My Name is Mayo" if you collect ‘clicker’ games, if you really need those 50 Achievements, or if you just need to own at least one ‘clicker’ game.

[u]My scoring system 7.5 / 10[/u]
10 / exemplary execution of the genre with compelling innovation
9 / exemplary execution of the genre don’t miss out, for fans of the genre and the curious alike
[u]8 / for well done not a must play, fans of the genre and newbs will be happy it is well done 
7 / for calibrated expectations only, fans of the genre would not miss out if they skipped this [/u]
6 / only for serious fans of the genre for whom game play with bugs is acceptable
5 / enough bugs to make me unhappy
